pdr_gameplay_spots_bomb_06: Oho! A bomb, just waiting for us.
pdr_gameplay_spots_bomb_08: No sense leaving that bomb behind.
pdr_gameplay_spots_bomb_09: Bombs and gobbos. Now that's a good mix.
pdr_gameplay_taking_heavy_damage_02_low: Come on, vermin! I'll show you how a dawi dies!
pdr_gameplay_taking_heavy_damage_03: Come on, Goreksson! One last blow!
pdr_gameplay_taking_heavy_damage_04: Are you scared of a dying dawi?
pdr_gameplay_taking_heavy_damage_05: Another like that, and I'm done.
pdr_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_01: The thaggoraki won't be far. Keep watch.
pdr_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_05: Enjoy this calm, dawri. It won't last.
pdr_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_06: There can be no rest for us. Not yet.
pdr_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_16: Raki prints, and larger tracks as well. We're not clear yet.
pdr_gameplay_throwing_bomb_03: Here, thaggoraki, taste a little fire!
pdr_gameplay_throwing_bomb_05: Watch your backsides, I'm throwing a bomb!
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_01: Let the Vardumi flail, he'll give you an opening.
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_02: Don't waste your strength. Look for an opening.
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_03: Save your strength, dawri! He's tiring!
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_04: Mad as a drunken boar. Wait for him to tire!
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_05: Hold your blows. Wait for him to weaken.
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_06: He doesn't feel a thing. Wait 'til he's spent!
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_01: The Vardumi's exhausted! Someone finish him!
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_03: That's better! Kill the Vardumi while you can!
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_05: That's the way, kill the Vardumi before he rouses.
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_06: Grungni's Teeth! Look at how that Vardumi wallows. He's weak!
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_07: Bakrazdumi always tire. Then they die.
pdr_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_08: Oho! That wazzok's ready for a thumping now!
pdr_gameplay_tips_pm_01: The Plague Raki won't feel your strikes as they hack at you.
pdr_gameplay_tips_pm_02: The Plague Raki just shake off your blows while they attack!
pdr_gameplay_tips_pm_03: Parry the Plague Raki to wear them down!
pdr_gameplay_tips_pm_04: Don't hit the Plague Rats while they attack, wait for the opportunity!
pdr_gameplay_tips_pm_05: You waste your breath by striking while they attack!
pdr_gameplay_tips_pm_06: He can't feel that! Let him tire!
pdr_gameplay_tips_pm_07: Let the Bakrazdumi tire. Then strike!
pdr_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_01: The Skazdumi and the portal are linked!
pdr_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_02: Kill the Skazdumi, close the portal!
pdr_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_03: The Sorcerer's death will close the portal!
pdr_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_04: Kick him in the dongliz - that'll seal the portal!
pdr_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_05: Ignore the portal, dawri. It's the Sorcerer we need!
pdr_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_06: Ignore the tentacle! Kill the bloody Sorcerer!
pdr_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_07: The Skazdumi needs a kicking if we're to close the portal.
pdr_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_08: Someone kill that Sorcerer so the portal closes!
pdr_gameplay_using_a_weapon_shrine_04: Oho, I'll smite a few with this, dawri!
pdr_gameplay_using_potion_04: Is there another? That wasn't half bad.
pdr_gameplay_using_potion_05: Is there another? That wasn't half bad.
pdr_gameplay_witch_hunter_being_helped_u: Rise up, Saltzpyre. We need you.
pdr_gameplay_witch_hunter_grabbed_by_ten: It has Grimgi! Cut him free!
Hack that grasping limb to bits! Free Grimgi!
Tentacle! Don't let it drag Saltzpyre to the portal!
pdr_gameplay_wizard_caught_by_slaver_3_t: Have a care Zharrinn! I reckon you look better with a head, than without.
You getting caught all the time, Zharrinn!
pdr_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_01: This is no time to keep lying down, Zharrinn!
pdr_gameplay_wizard_excels_dodging_01: Hah! Saw that one coming, didn't you pyromancer?
pdr_gameplay_wizard_hit_by_goo_thrice_01: Can't you see? It's bright green, for Grungni's sake!
pdr_gameplay_wizard_killing_a_second_rat: Two Rakogri on the same day? Impressive.
pdr_gameplay_wizard_killing_stormfiend_m: Aye, someone had to say enough is enough!
pdr_gameplay_wizard_killing_stormfiend_r: Hah! Zharrinn taught that Stormfiend who's the flame-spouter here!
pdr_gameplay_wizard_kills_3_specials_in_: Remind me never to offend you, Zharrinn! I don't want to end up like that 'raki!
pdr_gameplay_wizard_misses_bomb_02: Zharrinn? What was that meant to be?
pdr_gameplay_wizard_tentacle_grabbed_3_t: Can you not burn yourself free of those, Zharrinn?
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_being_helped_up_03: Try and stay up this time, waywatcher.
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_being_helped_up_04: Did a gust of wind catch you, elf?
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_dead_03: Grimnir's Teeth! The elf is gone!
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_dead_04: That's right, elf, leave us in the lurch!
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_grabbed_by_tentacl: Prefer that tentacle to us, do you, Elf?
It has the wutelgi! Cut her loose!
Cut the elf free, or we'll lose her!
That tentacle's taken a fancy to the elf!
Where's that agility now, Elf? Someone cut her free!
The elf's grabbered! Someone give her a hand!
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_low_on_health_01: They landed a good blow on you, Wutelgi!
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_low_on_health_02: Have you any blood left, elf?
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_low_on_health_03: You look fit to collapse, Waywatcher.
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_low_on_health_04: Rest awhile, Wutelgi. Recover your strength.
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_on_a_frenzy_01: Got some anger you're working out, elf?
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_on_a_frenzy_02: We'll make a dawi of you yet, Wutelgi!
pdr_gameplay_wood_elf_on_a_frenzy_04: Not bad for a skinny elf!
pdr_helmgart_military_mid_a_01: Well, we're definitely drawing notice, but why here? And why now?
pdr_helmgart_military_mid_a_02: I don't mind distracting the raki, but it'd be nice if Lohner had said why.
pdr_helmgart_military_mid_b_01: I heard Olesya was off spying on the skittergate. Using her magic, I don't doubt.
pdr_helmgart_military_mid_b_02: It's to do with the skittergate, and Olesya. That's what I heard.
pdr_helmgart_military_mid_c_01: And I thought she had eyes only for Azumgi! Hah!
pdr_helmgart_military_mid_c_02: She's a cunning one, that Aldrin.
pdr_hub_grudgemark_a_01: Well then, dawri. Who's up for settling a few grudges?
pdr_hub_grudgemark_a_02: Nothing beats the satisfaction of a settled grudge. Who's in?
pdr_hub_grudgemark_b_01: Anything for Okri, you know that.
pdr_hub_grudgemark_b_02: Grudges are serious business, dawri. You can let them fester, but you can't let them slide.
pdr_hub_grudgemark_c_01: Ah, this is the life - eh, drengbarazi?
pdr_hub_grudgemark_c_02: Grudge-settling is, what's the word? Therapeutic.
pdr_hub_olesya_conversation_eight_01: Not yet, though I've a mind to. Plenty of grudges to settle up in the northern World's Edge.
pdr_hub_olesya_conversation_nine_01: Ah, that'd be the toe-nails. Best bit on a troll, those.
pdr_hub_olesya_conversation_seven_01: Stomp? Stomp? I'll have you know my footsteps are as light as a sparrow's.
pdr_hub_olesya_conversation_six_01: You can certainly hold your drink, Olesya. It's all those wrinkles - they soak up the ale.
pdr_hub_olesya_conversation_ten_01: We've a natural musk, it's true. Regal, I've heard folk call it.
pdr_ib_level_bogenhafen_city_torch_01: I've a trained nose. I can smell these kruti in the dark. You might want the torch though, dawri.
pdr_ib_level_bogenhafen_slum_river_01: Pitiful excuse for defences. Where are the rising walls, the fire pits and the watchtowers? There should be a throng or two on guard.
pdr_level_bell_chime_03: Stand ready, dawri! The bell's tolling!
pdr_level_bell_chime_04: The bell's ringing? That can't be good.
pdr_level_bell_destroy_bell_01: The chains are the weak spot, dawri!
pdr_level_bell_destroy_bell_02: Reckon those chains are the weak-point, dawri.
pdr_level_bell_destroy_bell_03: The chains, they're the key! Have at them!
pdr_level_bell_destroy_bell_04: Same old umgak raki engineering. Shatter the chains, and no more bongs for this one.
pdr_level_bell_effect_03: See the raki, dawri? They go nutter when that bell rings.
pdr_level_bell_effect_04: Keep fighting, dawri! Frenzy won't help 'em if they've no limbs!
pdr_level_bell_falling_03: Thank Valaya! But must the bell complain so?
pdr_level_bell_falling_04: Bell's down. Might even shut up in a bit, if we're lucky.
pdr_level_bell_horde_03: Hear that? The raki are coming. Bell's calling 'em.
pdr_level_bell_horde_04: Raki scurrying to greet us. Called by the bell, I should imagine.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_01: Is that supposed to be Sigmar? Let himself go a bit, hasn't he?
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_02: Funny-looking statue for a funny-looking town.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_03: If you ask me, manlings would be better saving their metal for weapons.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_04: If manlings made walls with the same effort they reserved for statues, we'd be out of work.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_goblin_01: Look at that, dawri - a three-legged gobbo! Well, what's left of one...
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_goblin_02: Valaya's Tankard. That looks like a gobbo... With one too many legs...
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_goblin_03: That a gobbo, drengbarazi? Wonder how it got here. And how it got the extra leg.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_goblin_04: Only good gobbo is a dead gobbo, dawri. Number of legs doesn't come into it.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_noisy_01: Having a good time over there, dawri. Still, it's not a party until someone cleaves a gobbo in two.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_noisy_02: Not a one comes out to help. Ogling the fireworks, I suppose. Useless bunch.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_noisy_03: Call those fireworks? Umgak everywhere, as usual. Wouldn't mind, but they might come out and lend a hand.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_noisy_04: Grungni's Beard! No wonder we've no help with all that going on.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_objective_find: Spread out! Find those hidden switches!
Let's find those wretched switches. How hard can it be?
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_01: Wouldn't surprise me if this Sanctum Malafact... Maleficarum were hidden by some kind of mechanism.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_02: If there's a secret door to the sanctum, there'll be a lever.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_03: No sign of the sanctum, but I'll bet we can find a path, if we look hard enough.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_04: Cast your eyes around, dawri. The sanctum's here - we just need to find it.
pdr_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_books_: Who has time for reading? Songs, dawri - that's how you pass on the good stuff.
Now, let's - just this once - be careful with our flames. This place'll go up like a gobbo with a rocket up its arse.
Never seen the appeal of books, myself. Especially ones that whisper to you the whole time.
So, what was a fine upstanding priest doing with this little lot, eh?
pdr_level_catacombs_mist_01: I can't see one foot in front of the other!
pdr_level_catacombs_mist_02: Where'd this blasted mist come from?
pdr_level_catacombs_mist_03: A bit of ventilation'd sort this mess out. Too late now, of course.
pdr_level_catacombs_mist_04: Where'd you all go? Can't see a thing!
pdr_level_catacombs_shield_of_flies_03: Boga! No getting through those flies!
pdr_level_catacombs_shield_of_flies_04: Save it! We need another way.
pdr_level_chaos_war_camp_fight_themselve: They're still a bit too interested in us, dawri.
So... they're not fighting amongst themselves.
So, the one who kills us? I'm guessing he'll be the next champion.
Boga! They've taken their champion's loss a bit personal, dawri!
pdr_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_02: There's kazaki'dum lurking in those shacks, dawri.
pdr_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_03: Grimnir's beard! I've seen gobbos build to last better than this!
pdr_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_04: Keep your eyes on the shacks, drengbarazi.
pdr_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_01: The kazaki'dum have been busy raising defences. Good job they're not finished.
pdr_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_02: Good job they didn't have these towers further out, eh?
pdr_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_03: Glad we didn't leave this for later - the camp's growing all the time.
pdr_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_04: Call that a watchtower? Where are its barag? Its parapets?
pdr_level_fort_and_again_01: A good hit, but it needs another.
pdr_level_fort_and_again_03: Hit home, but the machine's still upright. We need to fire again.
pdr_level_fort_and_again_04: Boga! But give it another hit, and it'll fall.
pdr_level_fort_barrel_fouled_01: Umgak manling... (mutter) Where's the other cannon?
pdr_level_fort_barrel_fouled_02: Useless, worthless, umgak! We need the other cannon.
pdr_level_fort_barrel_fouled_03: What wazzok built this umgak? Good job there's another cannon.
pdr_level_fort_barrel_fouled_04: Just like a manling cannon. Useless after one shot. What of the other?
pdr_level_fort_cannonballs_03: We're out of cannonballs! Find some, dawri!
pdr_level_fort_cannonballs_04: Must be something else to shoot with around here.
pdr_level_fort_carriage_03: Keep up, dawri. If I can climb that, so can you.
pdr_level_fort_carriage_04: Over the carriage, drengbarazi. Time's a-wasting.
pdr_level_fort_clear_courtyard_01: Looks like the kazaki'dum still want to play.
pdr_level_fort_clear_courtyard_02: Still got fight in you, kazaki'dum? Good!
pdr_level_fort_clear_courtyard_03: We'll have to clear this courtyard the hard way.
pdr_level_fort_clear_courtyard_04: Oho! Looks like the northlanders are still wanting a fight!
pdr_level_fort_complete_01: Another fine job, if I say so myself.
pdr_level_fort_complete_02: That's the fort saved, dawri. Reinforcements'll be here soon.
pdr_level_fort_complete_03: A fortress saved, and a righteous thumping handed out. A good day's work.
pdr_level_fort_complete_04: This'll hold without us, now tithe siege is broken. And I want an ale or twelve.
pdr_level_fort_confirmation_02: What? He thinks we can't manage that?
pdr_level_fort_confirmation_04: Too easy! I wanted a challenge!
pdr_level_fort_cross_here_03: Will that take our weight? Then again, what choice is there?
pdr_level_fort_cross_here_04: That debris might work. But if I sink, I blame you, dawri.
pdr_level_fort_fire_02: Here, raki! We've a present for you!
pdr_level_fort_fire_04: What are you waiting for! Fire!
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_fire_03: Here we go! One more shot, and glorious victory is ours!
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_fire_04: Come on, dawri! One more shot. Just one.
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_hit_03: Whohoo! Many a dongliz blown to the skies! I love you all, dawri!
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_hit_04: A grand sight, and no mistake!
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_03: Aim that poor excuse of a cannon, dawri. If it can't deal with raki umgak, I lose all hope in you, manlings.
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_04: The cannon needs aiming, dawri. I think we all can see the benefits of blasting that catapult.
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_hit_03: By Grimnir, a fine shot and no mistake! Haha! Raki umgak.
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_hit_04: Haha! A flash, a roar, and raki dead! Good stuff, dawri!
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_03: They got more umgak on the move. Remind them of our cannon, dawri. Their scrambled raki brains forget so easily.
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_04: Another target, another shot needed, dawri! Haha, I can do this all day, should they wish!
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_hit_03: Haha! Did you see those raki fly, drengbarazi? Well, neither did I, but I imagined it vividly!
pdr_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_hit_04: Oh, dawri, I think I found a new friend in our cannon here! He's not dawi of course, but anyone killing raki like that, can drink with me!
pdr_level_fort_gate_fallen_03: That sounded like they breached the fortress gate, dawri. We're running out of time!
pdr_level_fort_gate_fallen_04: Gate's fallen. dawri. Let's hope that word has reached the defenders that heroes are inbound! It should steel their defence!
pdr_level_fort_getting_closer_03: Ha! We made it. So what about this secret path?
pdr_level_fort_getting_closer_04: Come on, dawri. We've a secret passage to find.
pdr_level_fort_get_back_on_road_01: Reckon we're past the blockage, dawri. Shall we return to the road?
pdr_level_fort_get_back_on_road_02: Road's clear now. We should be up there.
pdr_level_fort_get_back_on_road_03: That road looks clear. Is there a path back up?
pdr_level_fort_get_back_on_road_04: Road looks clear to me. See if there's a way back up, would you?
pdr_level_fort_jump_down_01: Off the road, dawri. We'll find another way around.
pdr_level_fort_jump_down_02: We'll have to leave the road, take a scenic route.
pdr_level_fort_jump_down_03: Well, the road was fine enough while it lasted.
pdr_level_fort_jump_down_04: Boots into the wilderness. That road's not leading us anywhere.
pdr_level_fort_plague_claw_destroyed_03: What's the matter, raki? Your toys broken?
pdr_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_02: Gas! Must be the plague claw.
pdr_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_03: (cough) Boga! The plague claw's still firing!
pdr_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_04: Can't let that catapult keep firing, dawri!
pdr_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_aler: Raki catapults, dawri! Watch out for the sludge! Rots your flesh in an instant.
It's raining toxic sludge, dawri, watch out!
pdr_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_move: Move, drengbarazi! Only raki poison here!
Press on, dawri! We're nothing but target practice for their catapults here!
pdr_level_fort_powder_and_shot_01: Powder and shot. Quickly, dawri. Quickly.
pdr_level_fort_powder_and_shot_02: Hmmm. We need powder and shot.
pdr_level_fort_powder_and_shot_03: Can't fire this without powder and shot.
pdr_level_fort_powder_and_shot_04: We'll need black powder and a mite of shot to make this work.
pdr_level_fort_push_them_back_01: To the Outer Courtyard, dawri! Charge like Okri when he charged against the Red-backed Scoffingbird!
pdr_level_fort_push_them_back_02: I know how to hold a fort, dawri. We must take the outer courtyard! Push the pact-skruff back!
pdr_level_fort_push_them_back_03: We won't win unless we hold the Outer Courtyard, dawri! Charge!
pdr_level_fort_push_them_back_04: Push the cess-drinkers back, drengbarazi! Take the Outer Courtyard!
pdr_level_fort_river_03: Here's where we go upriver, dawri. We'll have us a crossing soon.
pdr_level_fort_river_04: The crossing point's upriver, dawri. Then we find the secret entrance.
pdr_level_fort_skaven_everywhere_03: I guess these wazzocks think they're winning?! Let's make our presence known, drengbarazi!
pdr_level_fort_skaven_everywhere_04: Pact-raki, pact-dumi, pact-pig stickers, hah, I'll give you all a royal drubbing!
pdr_level_fort_skaven_run_02: Grimnir's Axe! The raki are running!
pdr_level_fort_skaven_run_04: Run, vermin! A dawi's too much for you!
pdr_level_fort_spotting_portal_01: There's the portal. Last one there gets left behind!
pdr_level_fort_spotting_portal_02: I see the portal. We'll soon be gone.
pdr_level_fort_spotting_portal_03: Wish we didn't have to leave the mountains so soon...
pdr_level_fort_spotting_portal_04: Is it time to go already? I was just getting started, dawri.
pdr_level_fort_this_is_it_01: There. Pact-sworn in the passages ahead. We ought to do the umgak place a favour with a touch of elegant blood splatter, dawri.
pdr_level_fort_this_is_it_02: Here we are, hot on the heels of the pact-sworn,. Or they're on the heels of us, Doesn't matter - they'll die the same.
pdr_level_fort_this_is_it_03: Thank Grungni! Feared I'd have to hack my own kruting entrance. Looks like someone beat me to it.
pdr_level_fort_this_is_it_04: Secret entrance not very secret, dawri. The raki have a snout for such things.
pdr_level_fort_under_attack_03: The raki don't know proper siegecraft, but they do have the numbers. And catapults. And kruti tunnels. (sigh)
pdr_level_fort_under_attack_04: I've seen many a fortress swarmed like this. Catapults are only the start. We don't have long.
pdr_level_fort_use_cannons_03: The raki catapults must go, dawri. We'll have to use the manling cannon.
pdr_level_fort_use_cannons_04: Those cannons still intact, dawri? They're an answer to the raki catapult problem.
pdr_level_ground_zero_boss_mid_fight_01: Keep fighting, drengbarazi! He's not walking away from this!
pdr_level_ground_zero_boss_mid_fight_02: Fall, dumi! A dawi never yields!
pdr_level_ground_zero_boss_mid_fight_04: Fight on, dawri! He has to die!
pdr_level_ground_zero_boss_spotted_01: Oh, I'll give you something, dumi! A beating loud enough to wake the ancestors.
pdr_level_ground_zero_boss_spotted_02: Sorcerer Lord, eh? What a dongliz. Just kill him, dawri.
pdr_level_ground_zero_complete_04: You smell that? Kruti smells even worse with his head split open.
pdr_level_ground_zero_draw_bridge_01: We need the bridge down. Someone split that rope.
pdr_level_ground_zero_draw_bridge_02: Get that bridge down, dawri. See the rope?
pdr_level_ground_zero_draw_bridge_03: Can we get yon bridge down? Must be a rope around here somewhere.
pdr_level_ground_zero_draw_bridge_04: Here! Now, if there was a way to split the bridge's anchor... Maybe a rope?
pdr_level_ground_zero_get_clear_02: Better step away. This'll be messy.
pdr_level_ground_zero_get_clear_03: We're about to get a shower of unspeakables, dawri.
pdr_level_ground_zero_get_clear_04: Get clear! And don't breathe in!
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_02: There it is. Ugly brute, isn't it?
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_03: Boga! I've seen some ugly trees in my time, but that one?
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_04: That's the tree? Looks like dung with teeth.
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_01: We might have to be clever about this one.
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_02: I'm not sure we can win this one with steel, dawri.
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_03: It's a mite big for our usual methods, don't you think?
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_04: So... How do we deal with that?
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_feed_explos: What am I using for brains...? Black powder! That's the answer!
Well, when an axe isn't enough, that's when we turn to black powder.
Looks hungry. How about we feed it some black powder?
We could always feed it some black powder. Can't hurt. Well, can't hurt us.
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_its_working: Just as well that tree's not very clever, eh?
Like a gobbo in a barrel of rotten apples. Keep going!
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_response_01: Won't last long against us, dawri.
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_response_02: We'll find a way to shift it, drengbarazi.
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_response_03: Well, no sense staring. We've work to do.
pdr_level_ground_zero_growth_sever_the_v: The vines'll part. Give 'em a whack or two!
I'll not be thwarted by a few rotten vines!
pdr_level_ground_zero_story_five_01: Daemon-trees? Well, what's the world coming to?
pdr_level_ground_zero_story_five_02: You may be right, wutelgi, but no sense giving up now, eh?
pdr_level_ground_zero_town_01: Doesn't look too bad from up here, dawri.
pdr_level_ground_zero_town_02: Is it me, or does Helmgart look salvageable from here?
pdr_level_ground_zero_town_03: Not too much damage. Bit of work, this town'll be a going concern again.
pdr_level_ground_zero_town_04: Town's taken a few knocks, but they'll rebuild, drengbarazi.
pdr_level_helmgart_military_door_opens_0: Door's open. That's our cue to leave.
We have an open door. Best make use of it, dawri.
Grungni's Bitter Breath! That door opened by itself!
How'd that door open? Never mind. We need a way out.
pdr_level_helmgart_military_story_six_01: Of course. Though most go better with a drop of Bugman's. Especially the one about Okri and the Troll Queen.
pdr_level_helmgart_military_story_six_02: Amorous, more like - though you're not to tell Okri I said that.
pdr_level_helmgart_military_story_ten_01: You ever wonder what's going on back home, wutelgi?
pdr_level_helmgart_military_story_ten_02: Typical elf, seeing things in absolutes.
pdr_level_helmgart_military_story_ten_03: From time to time. When I can bear to.
pdr_level_helmgart_military_story_three_: Why is it you manlings don't guard against the Skaven? You've strong enough walls to keep out greenskins and beastmen.
Is that so? Not sure there's anyone keeping the secret in Helmgart. Not any longer.
pdr_level_helmgart_military_story_twelve: Could be a good little fortress, this town.
Oh aye. But with good dawi walls, and stern dawi shields atop them...
Not how I'd have put it, but close enough.
pdr_level_mine_found_cart_first_03: There it is! We can stop searching!
pdr_level_mine_gloat_01: Bits of troll everywhere. Do we have time for a quick stew?
pdr_level_mine_gloat_02: Waste of good troll meat, that is.
pdr_level_mine_gloat_03: Keep an eye our for a liver. Best bit on a troll, except for the toes.
pdr_level_mine_gloat_04: You see that? (laugh) Never thought the pieces would go so far.
pdr_level_mine_story_eight_01: What were they mining down here, anyway?
pdr_level_mine_story_eight_02: Speak for yourself. A dawi's always ready to stake a claim.
pdr_level_mine_story_eight_03: Ah, but dwarfs are a dab hand at keeping trolls out. Or at least close enough to provide a good stew.
pdr_level_mine_story_eleven_01: Strange question. Why do you live above it?
pdr_level_mine_story_eleven_02: There you go. Normal for us isn't the same as normal for you.
pdr_level_mine_story_eleven_a_01: So, Kruber Why is it you can't grow a proper beard?
pdr_level_mine_story_nine_01: Aye. It's the tallow. Like chewing on a troll's finger.
pdr_level_mine_story_nine_02: We can't all eat roots and leaves.
pdr_level_mine_story_nine_03: Only that she thinks Grimgi's the one stealing them.
pdr_level_mine_story_one_01: Just look at this place. How manlings can work down here, I'll never know.
pdr_level_mine_story_one_02: How can it be? It's as likely to come down on us as stay up.
pdr_level_mine_story_one_03: You keep to chasing your heretics, Grimgi, and leave the mining to me, alright?
pdr_level_mine_story_seven_01: Do me a favour, dawri. Keep an eye out for a gromril seam. You never know...
pdr_level_mine_story_seven_02: You can talk. Or are you not getting paid?
pdr_level_mine_story_seven_a_01: Wouldn't dare. Nor would you, if you'd seen her wield a hammer.
pdr_level_mine_story_ten_01: Tomatoes. Poisonous to trolls, or so Okri said. Mind you, he was in a funny mood.
pdr_level_mine_story_ten_02: And you reckon you can lay your hands on some tomatoes, rotten or otherwise?
pdr_level_mine_story_twelve_01: We've all got secrets Azumgi. Even Saltzpyre.
pdr_level_mine_story_two_01: We'll want to tread carefully down here, dawri. A cornered troll's a terrible thing.
pdr_level_mine_story_two_02: Aye, just don't say I didn't warn you.
pdr_level_mine_story_two_03: Cautious, that's all, Zharrinn. Better to guard your wealth than mourn its loss, as... a cousin of mine used to say.
pdr_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_01: Look at that one. Funny place for a nap.
pdr_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_02: Looks like this poor wazzok took a wrong turn.
pdr_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_03: Oi! Wonder how he ended up here?
pdr_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_04: This one? Sleeping the sleep of the foully murdered, from the looks of it.
pdr_level_nurgle_barrier_01: Break through, dawri. We've no time for delay.
pdr_level_nurgle_barrier_02: Stopped by a flimsy obstacle like that? I think not, dawri.
pdr_level_nurgle_barrier_04: Give it a tap or two, dawri. It'll lets us through.
pdr_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_01: Old workings, dawri. And not Skaven-work. Keep going.
pdr_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_02: Looks like manling work, dawri. And it's too recent to be what we're after.
pdr_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_03: Don't get your hopes up, dawri. This is all too knew.
pdr_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_04: Now, these are mine workings alright, but they're not what we're looking for.
pdr_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_01: Good work, dawri. Now let's have a look for that portal.
pdr_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_02: Could be the lot comes down. Let's be away before that happens.
pdr_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_03: Don't like the look of that roof. We should get going.
pdr_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_04: Anyone seen the portal? I don't want to end up buried too.
pdr_level_nurgle_swift_river_03: You'll not catch me in those waters. I'm not a strong swimmer.
pdr_level_prologue_almost_there_01: Ah, that's better. Can't stand the stench of a raki lair.
pdr_level_prologue_almost_there_02: Smell that? Good mountain air... if spoilt by death.
pdr_level_prologue_almost_there_04: There we go, dawri. I told you we'd get out.
pdr_level_prologue_bardin_passing_one_01: #Oh how they tried, and how they failed, to break the dwarf, so dastardly jailed#
pdr_level_prologue_chaos_01: So we've northlanders too? This should be fun.
pdr_level_prologue_chaos_02: Kazaki'dum? What are they doing here?
pdr_level_prologue_chaos_03: Kruber, want to tell us why there are kazaki'dum after our hides?
pdr_level_prologue_chaos_04: Kazaki'dum too? The more the merrier, that's what I say.
pdr_level_prologue_elevator_01: Reckon that's our exit up ahead.
pdr_level_prologue_elevator_02: Is that the platform Aldrinn meant?
pdr_level_prologue_elevator_04: Hurry up, dawri. That's our lifting platform.
pdr_level_prologue_elevator_rising_01: The thaggoraki seem a bit worked up.
pdr_level_prologue_elevator_rising_02: It's like they don't want us to go.
pdr_level_prologue_elevator_rising_03: You're not catching us now, raki!
pdr_level_prologue_elevator_rising_04: Give up, raki! We're not coming back!
pdr_level_prologue_fight_01: Ah, raki! And I'm ready for a fight!
pdr_level_prologue_fight_02: Come on, wazzoks! I've indignities to repay with a good thumping!
pdr_level_prologue_fight_03: Don't expect any mercy today, raki!
pdr_level_prologue_fight_04: I warn you, raki. I haven't had an ale in weeks. Makes me... irritable.
pdr_level_prologue_reached_surface_01b: Are we seriously about to hop into some magic umgak expecting to come out in one piece?
pdr_level_prologue_reached_surface_02b: Fine. If I come out of the thing as the elf, I hold you all responsible.
pdr_level_prologue_seeing_crater_01b: I had heard of destruction on this scale before. Didn't believe it. Now I do.
pdr_level_prologue_stock_up_01: Don't be shy, dawri. Take all you can.
pdr_level_prologue_stock_up_02: No sense leaving out for the raki.
pdr_level_prologue_stock_up_03: If you need it, take it. That's my advice.
pdr_level_prologue_stock_up_04: Take whatever you can use, drengbarazi.
pdr_level_prologue_supply_02: That's a supply room, Or a plunder room.
pdr_level_prologue_supply_03: Raki have been busy looting, looks like.
pdr_level_prologue_supply_04: Look at all that in there. Ours for the taking.
pdr_level_prologue_what_are_they_up_to_0: So what is it the thaggoraki are up to, eh?
The raki are busy. They're always up to something.
Scheme all you like, raki. I'll see it stopped.
pdr_level_prologue_where_are_we_01: So, any ideas where we are?
pdr_level_prologue_where_are_we_02: Don't recognise this place. 'Course, the raki haven't left much.
pdr_level_prologue_where_are_we_03: We're not out of trouble yet. Looks like the raki have levelled this place.
pdr_level_prologue_where_are_we_04: No help for us out here, dawri. We're on our own. As usual.
pdr_level_prologue_wizard_down_b_02: She's down, not out. We'll get her back on her feet.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_city_on_fire: Raki umgak always good kindling, dawri. Just look at it burn.
Always a pleasure seeing raki filth torched, dawri.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_destroy_bann: I can't abide these colours flying over Karak Gnol. Cut them down!
Cut the flag down. Let's give Karak Gnol a few hours without them.
Kruting raki, flapping their flags above dawi stone. Cut it down!
Filthy banner. Someone tear it down, and I'll buy you a drink.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_find_another: Oi! Blocked! We need a new route to the forge.
No way through. We have to find another way to reach the forge, dawri.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_follow_track: Keep to tracks. dawri. They should see us to the forge.
Follow the tracks. dawri. They lead to the forge.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_hearing_pens: You hear that? Bunch of rakogri nearby.
I hear rakogri. Let's hope they don't hear us.
I'll be glad if those rakogri don't come any closer. The noise is enough for this dawi.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_lifting_devi: Hohoho! Look at that! Those flames will definitely improve the place.
Haha! A fortunate accident, won't you say?
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_move_lifting: Eh, dawri, clear the way, will ya?
Dawri, that umgak is barring our way.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_rat_ogre_ram: See them scatter! (laugh) Okri'd love this!
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_so_much_for_: Don't look at me. I was being all quiet and sneaky. Like an elgi.
I guess sneaking's out. It wasn't me that woke 'em up, mind you. I tread light as a feather.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_eleven: Aye, well... They're not suitable for a manling. Wouldn't be fair.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_one_01: Aye, we have made something of a name for ourselves hereabouts.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_seven_: About six hundred and thirty-two years, fifty seven days and five hours. Approximately speaking, of course.
Aye, things got a little confused in the last moments.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_six_01: Me, Zharrinn? I'm more of a troll expert, myself. And gobbos, of course.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_six_02: Didn't say that. Raki get everywhere. But you don't need to know their flags to beat 'em to a pulp, do you?
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_ten_01: My folk have other battles in hand. Always do.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_ten_02: Did you not hear the elgi? Muttering about portents and dreams. There's only darkness ahead.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_ten_03: Look around. Think on all we've seen. Little enough chance of that.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_three_: Grimgi gave me the name of a raki clan to shout when we fight the warlord. I've forgotten it.
Aye, that's a good idea. I'll do that. My thanks, Azumgi!
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_two_01: So, did I hear right earlier, Grimgi? We're to pretend we're agents of Clan Mork?
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_two_02: I was going to say. Mork's a gobbo deity. Said to be cunning and brutal. Or brutal and cunning.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_two_03: Understood, Grimgi. Clan Mork it is.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_story_victor: Oho, I can tell you enjoyed killing the raki warlord, Grimgi. Old business, I presume?
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_viaduct_01: See that viaduct, dawri? That's our way.
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_viaduct_02: The viaduct. dawri! Up we go!
pdr_level_skaven_stronghold_warlord_nest: That's our goal, dawri. See that nest up there?
There's the nest. Reckon we'll find the warlord inside.
Filthy raki, lording it over an honest hold like he owns the place.
That the warlord's nest? Just wait 'til I get up there.
pdr_level_skittergate_crates_01: We need more warpstone. Might be some down there.
pdr_level_skittergate_crates_02: Wish we didn't need warpstone, but as we do, might be worth checking that dock.
pdr_level_skittergate_crates_04: How about we search those crates? Not like they'll leave warpstone lying around in the snow.
pdr_level_skittergate_destroy_01: I don't see anything we can smash, dawri.
pdr_level_skittergate_destroy_02: Eh. This is going to be harder than I thought. Can you see anything breakable?
pdr_level_skittergate_destroy_03: Boga! All the sensitive stuff must lie beyond the threshold.
pdr_level_skittergate_destroy_04: Anyone see something we can smash, drengbarazi?
pdr_level_skittergate_encampment_01: That's a lot of northlanders. You up for this, dawri?
pdr_level_skittergate_encampment_02: Look at all those kazaki'dum! Just remember - I saw them first!
pdr_level_skittergate_encampment_03: Lot of kazaki'dum in our path, but that won't stop us, eh?
pdr_level_skittergate_encampment_04: Oho! We've a northlander camp ahead. That'll keep this interesting.
pdr_level_skittergate_fire_gatekkeper_de: Has it finally ceased its thrashing?
Stay down, scunner. Settle with two deaths today.
If only all triumphs were so complete.
pdr_level_skittergate_fire_gatekkeper_tr: Seems his god is none too pleased. Fight on, mayflies!
The body writhes to match a corrupt soul. It'll die, all the same.
No use bawling, kazaki'dum! Not like you ever had a comely face to begin with!
pdr_level_skittergate_follow_02: We'll have to go through, dawri. Ready for a real fight?
pdr_level_skittergate_follow_03: Into the portal, drengbarazi. We can't stop this from here.
pdr_level_skittergate_follow_04: Hold onto your boots, dawri. We're going through the portal.
pdr_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_01: Nothing changes. The kazaki'dum are always marching to war.
pdr_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_02: These ships'll keep coming south as long as the world lasts, dawri.
pdr_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_03: Those ships are only the first. Others'll come, drengbarazi.
pdr_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_04: Looks like the prospect of plunder's spreading. New axes taking ship in search of glory.
pdr_level_skittergate_open_the_gate_02: We can't be stopped so close. Look for a way through.
pdr_level_skittergate_open_the_gate_03: Can you see a lever, drengbarazi?
pdr_level_skittergate_open_the_gate_04: By Grimnir's Beard! Someone open this gate!
pdr_level_skittergate_rasknitt_death_rat: Hack up or shoot up the Stormfiend, dawri! No fussing with the Seer's shield!
He's feeling safe behind his magics. Just wait til we chop down his pet.
pdr_level_skittergate_rasknitt_dismounte: No shield on the Seer. dawri. Last one to hit him is a turgid dollop.
pdr_level_skittergate_rasknitt_gate_big_: Oh, we have a big un, dawri!
Hear that? That's no lightweight, dawri.
pdr_level_skittergate_rasknitt_reply_a_0: You wait 'til I get close to you, raki!
Where's the fun in that, raki?
Never cross a dawi! You should know that by now!
I'll take pleasure in crushing your skull, raki!
pdr_level_skittergate_rasknitt_reply_b_0: No one toys with this dawi!
You talk a lot, raki. How about coming down here to fight?
Listen to that raki. Thinks he's winning this.
pdr_level_skittergate_rasknitt_teleport_: Don't let him get away, dawri! Move those longshanks!
He's off again! After him, dawri!
And there he goes again! Keep chasing him, dawri!
Stay and fight, raki! I'm coming for you, no matter how far!
pdr_level_skittergate_replace_power_01: Let's get the glowing umgak in place.
pdr_level_skittergate_replace_power_02: Hurry up, dawri. Get the warpstone in position.
pdr_level_skittergate_replace_power_03: Let's get power back to the skittergate.
pdr_level_skittergate_replace_power_04: Let's wake the gate. We can't stay here forever.
pdr_level_skittergate_story_five_01: You and me both, Azumgi. He's been lucky, that's all.
pdr_level_skittergate_story_five_02: Then we'll kill him, and steal it back. It'll be a pleasure.
pdr_level_skittergate_story_nine_01: Aye, one or two. We've lost most to the kazaki'dum, mind.
pdr_level_skittergate_story_nine_02: Aye, well, there's a kind of madness in these parts. Not many of my kind want to risk it.
pdr_level_skittergate_story_ten_01: Now that's a lot of kazaki'dum.
pdr_level_skittergate_story_ten_02: What is it you know, wutelgi?
pdr_level_skittergate_story_two_01: A last fight, Azumgi? I'm not dying here. To come so far and fail? It'd be embarrassing.
pdr_level_skittergate_story_two_02: Aye. Let's show these wazzoks what we're made of!
pdr_level_skittergate_vast_camp_01: Looks like the Rotblood's we've fought were barely a pebble in the scree, dawri.
pdr_level_skittergate_vast_camp_02: That's a lot of kazaki'dum. Too many for us.
pdr_level_skittergate_vast_camp_03: That's what's heading through the gate if we fail, dawri.
pdr_level_skittergate_vast_camp_04: Look at those tents. The invasion's not long off, not now.
pdr_level_skittergate_winchway_follow_01: Pick up your feet, dawri. It's getting away.
pdr_level_skittergate_winchway_follow_02: Come along, dawri. Don't want to lose it now.
pdr_level_skittergate_winchway_follow_03: Looks like we're going back up the hill.
pdr_level_skittergate_winch_01: Pile of umgak, but it should get the warpstone where it's needed.
pdr_level_skittergate_winch_02: Look at this mess. Let's hope it holds together long enough to convey the warpstone.
pdr_level_skittergate_winch_03: This winch-way's a pile of umgak, but it beats hauling warpstone around by hand.
pdr_level_skittergate_winch_04: I'll be glad not to haul that warpstone around. We'll risk the winch-way.
pdr_level_ussingen_cart_idea_01: A cart? That gives me an idea. One that calls for black powder.
pdr_level_ussingen_cart_idea_02: So, I wonder about that cart. And some black powder.
pdr_level_ussingen_cart_idea_03: Oho! How about we fill that cart with something merry, like black powder?
pdr_level_ussingen_cart_idea_04: That cart's just what we need. Find me black powder, and we'll have a bonfire.
pdr_level_ussingen_cart_torch_01: Won't light itself, dawri. Look for a torch.
pdr_level_ussingen_cart_torch_02: We need a brand, or a tinderbox. Or...
pdr_level_ussingen_cart_torch_03: Don't tell me we can't manage a small light between us, dawri?
pdr_level_ussingen_cart_torch_04: Look for a torch. I can't light it with a stern look, dawri!
pdr_level_ussingen_gatehouse_03: Slovenly. Kazaki'dum think they're warriors, but they can't even defend a gatehouse properly.
pdr_level_ussingen_search_for_manor_04: Which way to the manor, do you think?
pdr_level_ussingen_stockpile_found_02: They've certainly stuffed the manor full to bursting!
pdr_level_ussingen_stockpile_found_03: Shame to destroy food, drengbarazi, but time isn't on our side.
pdr_level_ussingen_stockpile_found_04: Stuffed floor to ceiling with looted grain and supplies...
pdr_level_ussingen_what_next_01: Well, now the we've found the Manor, next stop should be the Mining Emporium.
pdr_level_ussingen_what_next_02: Now, find the Mining Emporium. We need Black powder.
pdr_level_ussingen_what_next_03: Well dawri, guess we need to find that Mining Emporium.
pdr_level_ussingen_what_next_04: We have our target so let's find our tool for the job. Look for the Mining Emporium.
pdr_morris_hub_interact_valaya_01: Valaya is the ancestor goddess of hearth and home, a soother of wounds and a brewer of ale. She is revered by those who value kin and company above all.
pdr_morris_met_god_conversation_01: Valaya sounded like my Grelda. Still my hearth and home, even now.
pdr_morris_met_god_conversation_02: Valaya? It was like being taken to task by my Grelda. Happier times. I wish they were back.
pdr_objective_achieved_all_but_one_goal_: So easy. Get that last one!
That took too long. Let's end it.
pdr_objective_correct_path_door_02: This looks like the right doorway.
pdr_objective_correct_path_door_04: This is the door, I reckon.
pdr_objective_correct_path_down_03: Are you coming? It's this way.
pdr_objective_correct_path_street_03: Come here! I've found the path.
pdr_objective_correct_path_this_way_03: We need to go this way!
pdr_objective_correct_path_up_01: No guarantees, but I think it's over here.
pdr_objective_correct_path_up_02: Do you want to stay here forever, dawri?
pdr_objective_dropping_grimoire_10: Ugly bloody waste of good ink anyway.
pdr_objective_dropping_grimoire_11: Revolting mass of scrawl. Better off gone.
pdr_objective_dropping_grimoire_12: Hope we didn't need that book.
pdr_objective_goal_achieved_escape_04: Are you deaf? We have to get out of here.
pdr_objective_goal_achieved_more_left_05: Let's get the next one done!
pdr_objective_goal_achieved_more_left_07: That's progress! They can't stop us!
pdr_objective_interacting_with_objective: I have this. Watch my back.
pdr_objective_nearing_objective_deadline: We don't have time for this!
pdr_objective_picking_up_grimoire_01: A repulsive tome. We should steal it, then destroy it.
pdr_objective_picking_up_grimoire_02: I can feel my strength slipping away...
pdr_objective_picking_up_grimoire_03: I think this grimoire's eyeing me up to be its lunch.
pdr_objective_picking_up_grimoire_04: Don't get too close, dawri. I think it bites.
pdr_objective_skaven_exit_01: That's the exit, dawri! One last push, now!
pdr_objective_skaven_exit_02: I told you they'd not stop us!
pdr_objective_skaven_exit_03: The open sky, and not before time.
pdr_objective_skaven_exit_04: Don't lose hope, we're almost there!
pdr_ojective_cemetery_done_01: If only Cousin Okri could have seen that cauldron go down!
pdr_ojective_cemetery_done_02: A fine days work! Cauldron is gone, so we should go to.
pdr_ojective_cemetery_done_03: Good times, Drengbarazi! Our deed is done, so let's move on
pdr_ojective_cemetery_done_04: Hah! We showed those poison raki not to mess with us!
pdr_painter_conversation_one_01: Can’t say I’ve ever seen Catrinne at all. I was wondering if she was one of those, you know,  unquiet spirits.
pdr_painter_conversation_two_01: Only in blood. Would you like me to show you?
pdr_prologue_bardin_free_a_01: Did you have to drop me on my head?
pdr_prologue_bardin_free_a_02: Not so rough next time, Azumgi. You've fair cracked my head open.
pdr_prologue_gorreksson_e_01: Oi! Wazzoks! Get me down from here!
pdr_prologue_gorreksson_e_02: Grimnir's Beard! Hush your yammering and get me DOWN!
pdr_prologue_portal_b_01: Grimgi! Alive and in the flesh!
pdr_prologue_portal_d_01: What's wrong with a fighting escape? Can't be more than a few thousand Skaven out there.
pdr_skittergate_power_up_a_01: Boga! We're trapped. We'll have to power the kruting thing up again.
pdr_skittergate_power_up_a_02: Nothing to stop that raki turning the power back on. Mind you, we'll have to find a way ourselves. It's a long walk home.
pdr_skittergate_power_up_b_01: That can't be the only scrap of warpstone hereabouts, dawri.
pdr_skittergate_power_up_b_02: Seems we need more warpstone, eh?
pdr_skittergate_power_up_c_01: You know, shouldn't take much to get the umgak overloaded, once it's powered.
pdr_skittergate_power_up_c_02: And with power, we can set the umgak thing to overload, maybe.
pdr_wh_backstory_five_01: And what would you know of good steel, Grimgi?
pes_amber_weave_conversation_one_01_2nd_: Ulric? Load of cold wind and hot air. He should try taking on Taal!
pes_amber_weave_conversation_three_01_2n: Yeah, never met a shaman who wasn't fond of the odd medicinal mushroom.
pes_amber_weave_conversation_two_01_2nd_: You say that like we get a choice...
pes_amethyst_weave_conversation_one_01_1: What's that? Who's there?... Anyone else hear voices?
pes_amethyst_weave_conversation_three_01: Lucky guess. Let's call it that, and stay friends.
pes_amethyst_weave_conversation_two_01_3: Not sure I've anything against the undead, as such. If only they didn't get so stabby... and throttle-y, and flay-y...
pes_bastion_conversation_ten_01: You really think there's a market for that?
pes_bright_weave_conversation_one_01_2nd: Easy for you to say. Some of us are flammable.
pes_bright_weave_conversation_three_01_3: Yeah, our pointy-ear's better than that. She'd not do anything... Ignore me. Can't think why I said that.
pes_bright_weave_conversation_two_01_1st: Too bloody hot in here. Too bloody hot by far.
pes_bw_future_five_02: You've gone a tiny bit psychotic, love.
pes_celestial_weave_conversation_one_01_: See, I've a mate who swears blind that the high elves - snotty little sods - can read the future in the stars.
pes_celestial_weave_conversation_three_0: Nice here, isn't it? Peaceful. Serene... Is that the word? Serene?
pes_celestial_weave_conversation_two_01_: Don't suppose he'd lower himself to lending a hand. That'd be nice.
pes_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_c_01: Sound strategy, I must admit. ALRIGHT! QUIT YOUR NOISE! WE'LL GIVE YOU A KICKING!
pes_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_c_02: Can't talk you out of this, can I? FINE! WE'LL FIGHT!
pes_chaos_war_camp_taunt_payback_reply_0: Listen, mate, we're busy killing your kin everyday, so I can't say for sure, but it does ring a bell. That Ghûlmagak a friend of yours. perhaps?
Listen, mate, we're busy killing your kin everyday, so I can't say for sure, but it does ring a bell. That Ghûlmagak a friend of yours. perhaps?
pes_crawl_end_event_find_good_beer_02: Grab that cask! One does not simply walk out on a stash of Bugman's.
pes_crawl_end_event_find_good_beer_03: Oi, mates. We're not gonna leave that Bugman's around for someone else to pinch are we?
pes_crawl_end_event_keep_running_02: Hah! You'll never catch fleet-footed Kruber!
pes_crawl_end_event_tunnel_02: The end of the tunnel. Looks like there's a way out.
pes_crawl_end_event_waystone_03: Another valiant sortie, accomplished under the sterling leadership of old Kruber!
pes_crawl_end_event_waystone_04: Quick march, through the bleeding portal. I don't know, drunken layabouts, the lot of ya.
pes_crawl_end_event_way_open_03: Can we get out through the cellar?
pes_crawl_end_event_way_open_04: We'll have to try the cellar.
pes_crawl_get_into_third_pub_01: We're not gonna let that stop us, are we? We're eighty-percent of the Ubersreik Five!
pes_crawl_get_into_third_pub_04: Oi! Open up! Genuine bleedin' heroes in need of succour!
pes_crawl_have_a_drink_02: Aha! See mates? <hic> It's not all bad!
pes_crawl_head_for_first_pub_01: So, we making a move on this tavern, or what?
pes_crawl_head_for_first_pub_04: Pretty sure there's a dwarf tavern nearby... What was it called now... No... Can't quite...
pes_crawl_head_for_second_pub_02: The Hungry Troll wasn't the only tavern. Let's try the Feuerblümchen.
pes_crawl_head_for_second_pub_04: What about the Feuerblümchen? Good place for a quiet drink.
pes_crawl_head_for_third_pub_01: We can't go back now! We'd better find us another tavern.
pes_crawl_head_for_third_pub_04: What about the Obese Megalodon? They'll have a hero's welcome for us.
pes_crawl_heard_us_01: Weapons up, mates! They're after our brew!
pes_crawl_heard_us_04: Come on, you buggers! I've got a present for ya!
pes_crawl_loud_crash_01: And now we'll have to fight...
pes_crawl_loud_crash_03: Bloody marvellous. Why don't you drop it all on our heads?
pes_crawl_loud_crash_04: Taal! I felt the floor shift that time!
pes_crawl_mid_level_banter_02: Well, isn't this jolly? We're an odd bunch, mates, but I don't know anyone else'd have us.
pes_crawl_mid_level_banter_04: I love the whole filthy lot of you, and I ain't ashamed to say so. Just don't tell Olesya. She'll only get the wrong idea.
pes_crawl_old_path_blocked_03: What kind of a world do we live in when an honest soldier can't stagger down to an inn?
pes_crawl_old_path_blocked_04: Even a quiet drink turns into a bloody scramble. Ain't right.
pes_crawl_pub_brazers_02: See? Do I ever lead you <hic> wrong?
pes_crawl_pub_brazers_04: Here we are. The Hungry Troll. Who's buying the first round?
pes_crawl_pub_destroyed_02: What maniac did that, then? Was that one of you?
pes_crawl_pub_destroyed_03: I don't think we're getting a drink here, mates.
pes_crawl_pub_district_sign_01: (laugh) Old Kruber leads the way yet again! We're at the tavern district!
pes_crawl_pub_district_sign_02: Here. We've reached the <hic> tavern district.
pes_crawl_pub_door_04: I bet it smells even better on the inside.
pes_crawl_pub_horde_end_02: Yeah? Yeah? Come between Old Kruber and a bevvy, would ya?
pes_crawl_pub_horde_end_03: Whew! I'm out of breath. Might need a bit of a guzzle to get me strength back.
pes_crawl_shortcut_01: As our master <hic> strategist, I recommend we go through the park.
pes_crawl_shortcut_04: Quick march! Through the park! I don't want to get there and find all the ale gone!
pes_crawl_slaughter_01: Attacking folk who're having a quiet drink? Monsters! Barbarians!
pes_crawl_slaughter_03: This ain't pretty, is it? We'll have vengeance, or my middle name's not Algernon! Wait. Is it Algernon? Can't bloody remember.
pes_crawl_spot_first_pub_02: Can't beat a dwarf tavern for a bit of brew.
pes_crawl_spot_first_pub_04: Race you to the tavern, mates!
pes_crawl_spot_first_pub_closer_01: Always further to go, ain't there?
pes_crawl_spot_first_pub_closer_04: Don't lose spirits now, mates. On we go...
pes_crawl_spot_second_pub_03: You know, I can't help thinking it looked a bit different last time I was here...
pes_crawl_spot_second_pub_04: Can't sup ashes, can we? Bloody hellfire and soggy bread!
pes_crawl_spot_third_pub_01: The Obese Megalodon, and the only bloody megalodon I hope to every bloody see!
pes_crawl_spot_third_pub_02: The Obese Megalodon. Our one and true saviour in these parched hours.
pes_crawl_tunnel_passage_01: Let's hope the whole lot don't come down on us...
pes_crawl_tunnel_passage_03: Oh no! The sky's falling on my head. Oh, wait. It's a tunnel.
pes_es_backstory_four_01: They're avenged. That'll have to do. No happy endings in these times.
pes_es_backstory_four_02: Is there no cheer in dwarf holds? You always seem glad enough.
pes_fort_intro_a_01: We need to make better time. Brachsenbrücke needs us.
pes_fort_intro_a_02: Set a good pace, mates. Can't afford to arrive too late. Not this time.
pes_fort_intro_b_01: This is a good road. It's exactly what we need.
pes_fort_intro_b_02: The road's the key. The fortress is just a quick march away.
pes_fort_intro_c_02: Get marching - or we will be too late.
pes_gameplayd_dwarf_killing_stormfiend_m: So, would that be from his 'dongliz'? Or... have I got it wrong?
pes_gameplay_another_is_bunnyjumping: This is a battle, not a dance. Feet on the ground!
pes_gameplay_armoured_enemy_bright_wizar: Armour, Wizard! Sear its face off instead!
Aim for its skull, Wizard, its armour is thick.
Sienna, hit the head, and only the head!
pes_gameplay_armoured_enemy_dwarf_ranger: No use, Bardin, aim for the skull instead!
Take their heads off, Ranger, and their armour won't matter!
pes_gameplay_armoured_enemy_witch_hunter: Armour, sir! Aim for the head!
Take its head off, Sir! it's well armoured.
pes_gameplay_armoured_enemy_wood_elf_01: You need more power, Elf, or only aim for the head.
pes_gameplay_armoured_enemy_wood_elf_03: It won't go down like that, Elf! Hit the head!
pes_gameplay_bile_troll_vomit_pool_02: Mates, no stepping in troll puke!
pes_gameplay_bile_troll_vomit_pool_07: Vile stuff. Don't let it touch you.
pes_gameplay_bile_troll_vomit_pool_08: Troll puke! Avoid, if you like your feet.
pes_gameplay_block_broken_by_heavy_hit_c: Ride the blow, Sienna - dodge it!
You can't match his strength, wizard. Dodge!
Get out of the way, Sienna!
Move out of the way, Sienna!
You need to dodge his strikes, dwarf!
Come on, Goreksson! Let the next one cleave air!
Make sure he misses his next, dwarf!
Get clear! Nothing more you can do there!
If you've can't parry, elf, move!
Don't let him hit you again, elf!
pes_gameplay_bright_wizard_being_helped_: Quickly Wizard, we haven't much time!
No use to us on the ground, wizard.
pes_gameplay_bright_wizard_dead_01: By the Comet, she'll be missed!
pes_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_by_te: Sienna! Fight it! We'll get you free!
I bloody hate tentacles, and now one got Sienna!
Sienna's been caught! cut that tentacled tosser to pieces!
Someone help Sienna! The warpcaller got her!
Tentacle's grabbed Sienna! Cut that thing off!
pes_gameplay_bright_wizard_low_on_health: Cool your fire, Wizard - you're injured.
Don't you have a healing spell?
pes_gameplay_bright_wizard_on_a_frenzy_0: You have yer ways, spell-caster - I'll give yer that.
It's not how I'd do it!
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_01: I thought I'd given up taking orders!
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_02: I left the Elector Count's service and end up in anothers!
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_03: I was meant to be returning to the farm...
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_04: These Skaven - are they the same creatures from the bedtime myths?
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_05: What could the ratmen want with my old backwater town?
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_06: Once we're clear, we should head to Altdorf - to the Reiksmarshal!
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_07: My arm tires, how many of these vermin do we have to slay!
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_08: What have they done to my old town...
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_09: We need Greatswords, Reiksguard - not just us!
pes_gameplay_casual_quotes_10: By Taal, I hope they're alive...
pes_gameplay_chaos_champion_charge_reply: Just you wait, you're not the only one here with a decent charge!
pes_gameplay_collecting_a_faith_coin_02: I'll just look after these, yeah?
pes_gameplay_cursed_chest_complete_01: Well... that took a bit of doing...
pes_gameplay_dead_body_01: Poor buggers. Didn't stand a chance.
pes_gameplay_dead_body_02: I've seen too many bodies in my life.
pes_gameplay_dead_body_03: I guess you're right... the dead are the lucky ones.
pes_gameplay_dead_body_04: The priests of Morr will have a handful.
pes_gameplay_dead_body_05: One can only hope it was quick for the most of them.
pes_gameplay_dead_end_03: I know this place, it's a dead end.
pes_gameplay_dead_end_05: I know these streets, this is the wrong way.
pes_gameplay_dwarf_killing_stormfiend_me: We could use more like you Bardin. Maybe some of your friends, or dare I say, family?
pes_gameplay_dwarf_killing_stormfiend_ra: Stormfiend's a goner! Another quality shot from Bardin!
It was Bardin, I saw it. No need for highly educated guesswork.
pes_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_being_helped_u: Stop wasting my time, get up, Dwarf!
Quick, Ranger, we're not safe yet!
pes_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_dead_01: Gods damnit! We lost the Dwarf!
pes_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_dead_02: Back to your ancestors then, Dwarf!
pes_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_by_ten: Goreksson! Stop messing with that tentacle!
Bardin's covered in slime and tentacle! Someone take action, will ya?
Mates? I think the dwarf needs unwinding.
Got yourself a playful friend there, Bardin. Guess we should split you two up.
Warpcaller's targeted our Dwarf. Time we target that soddin bastard.
pes_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_low_on_health_: Get yourself healed and be done!
Cough your guts up, Goreksson, and get healed.
pes_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_on_a_frenzy_02: Nice, but your technique lacks efficiency.
pes_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_on_a_frenzy_03: If I swung like a loon, I'd kill lots too.
pes_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_on_a_frenzy_04: Alright, Dwarf - you've killed a few.
pes_gameplay_elf_caught_by_slaver_3_time: Hah! Guess Kerillian's hooked on the... um, Packmaster's catching thing.
pes_gameplay_elf_excels_dodging_01: Look at the elf! Graceful as she is sharp!
pes_gameplay_elf_hit_by_goo_thrice_01: Can you not see it coming, elf?
pes_gameplay_elf_is_bunnyjumping_01: I know elves are odd folk, but is that jumping about normal?

Yeah, helping out with that infamous count of yours. You're welcome!
pes_gameplay_elf_killing_stormfiend_rang: You're as good at shooting as you're bad at being nice, elf.
pes_gameplay_elf_misses_bomb_02: If you can't use those bombs elf, don't bother trying.
pes_gameplay_elf_tentacle_grabbed_3_time: I swear you keep walking into their grasp, elf.
pes_gameplay_encouraging_words_02: Sigmar wants us to rid this town of vermin!
pes_gameplay_encouraging_words_05: I served with good men before, I do so now!
pes_gameplay_encouraging_words_06: Slay the rats - that's all we can do.
pes_gameplay_friendly_fire_bright_wizard: Got a problem with me, Wizard?
Aim for the rat-men, not me!

No! Bad dwarf! Stop shooting me!

Bardin? Do I look like one of them?
You want to lose your beard? Keep that up.
No! Bad dwarf! Stop shooting me!

pes_gameplay_healing_wood_elf_06: Wound binding, elf. It's that time of the year.
pes_gameplay_healing_wood_elf_08: Here we go. A little pick-me-up.
pes_gameplay_healing_wood_elf_09: I guess you trust mayfly medicine after all.

pes_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_02: I know that heavy tread. That's a Chaos Warrior...
pes_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_03: There's a tougher Northlander close by...
pes_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_04: Ten gets you one that's a Chaos Warrior. Any takers?
pes_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_cha: Reckon there's a Chaos Champion nearby.
That's a big rot-helm. Time to work as a team, mates.
Taal! That's the last thing we needed. A Chaos bloody Champion.
Hear that? Chaos Warrior Champion. Gimme some ale, will ya?
For pity's sake, that's a Champion!
pes_gameplay_hearing_a_minotaur_combat_0: Reckon we've a minotaur close by.
Don't want to worry you, but has anyone seen a minotaur?
pes_gameplay_hearing_a_standard_bearer_0: Cheering that flag bearer's really spoiling their sneak attack.
All that noise... A flag bearer's coming.
Hear the chant? Here comes a flag...
Here it comes. Watch for the flag.
pes_gameplay_hearing_a_standard_bearer_c: Eyes open! There's a flag bearer coming!
Sing out if you see that flag bearer!
Where's that bloody flag bearer? They're not cheering nothing.
Hear that? Flag bearer's coming! Let's say hello.
pes_gameplay_hearing_marauder_berserker_: Nothing subtle about that Frother. Still, at least we know he's there.
Here, that's a Savage. Get ready.
Think I hear a Frother. We can take him.
pes_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_04: Sounds like a lot of them.
pes_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_07: Stay together, take them in pairs!
pes_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_03: This doesn't put me in your debt!

I think Saltzpyre just took a compliment without firing off a lecture in response!
pes_gameplay_hunter_killing_stormfiend_m: Nice. Saltzpyre took down the Stormfiend!
Oh, I bet there was more than a pinch of hate involved too.
pes_gameplay_hunter_killing_stormfiend_r: That's a proper shot, sir. Stormfiend's no more.
Always try to hit that rat-thing fused to its back, sir.

pes_gameplay_hunter_tentacle_grabbed_3_t: With respect sir, three tentacles is looking like carelessness.
pes_gameplay_incoming_globadier_08: Keep moving, that thing's going to explode!
pes_gameplay_i_will_tank_01: I've got a shield. I'll get their attention.
pes_gameplay_i_will_tank_02: This is where I should raise my shield.
pes_gameplay_i_will_tank_03: They batter, I shield, you kill. alright?
pes_gameplay_i_will_tank_04: I'll use my shield, you use your weapons!
pes_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_02: I've killed the Spawn. Thank me later!
pes_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_03: Taal's Horns, that's a dead Spawn!
pes_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_06: Who killed the Spawn? You have to ask?
pes_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_07: Discipline meets anarchy, and guess who won?
pes_gameplay_killing_a_second_rat_ogre_0: Tough and ugly. Like my dear old mother.
pes_gameplay_killing_a_standard_bearer_0: Bugger off into the darkness, flag bearer!
One less flag bearer. Happy days.
No more trouble from that flag bearer.
pes_gameplay_killing_a_troll_03: Whew, that Troll smells worse dead than alive.
pes_gameplay_killing_a_troll_05: Oi! Troll's a goner! Good one!
pes_gameplay_killing_a_troll_06: Hey! Where's my praise? That was a Troll I just killed.
pes_gameplay_killing_a_troll_07: Taal's Teeth! The Troll's done for!
pes_gameplay_killing_gutterrunner_03: This assassin's dead. Watch for others.
pes_gameplay_killing_lootrat_02: No more running for the Sack-Rat!

Thank Taal for that. Berserker nearly had me...

pes_gameplay_low_on_health_05: Those gods-cursed Skaven have done me.

pes_gameplay_low_on_health_08: Soon, I'll join my brother's in arms.

pes_gameplay_no_nearby_teammates_08: Now is not the time to run off!
