Tentacle has One-Eye A match made in heaven.
One-Eye? Hold on, we'll get you out of that.
No. I suppose we can't let the tentacle have One-Eye.
One-Eye? We can free him, if we're quick!
Oh look. The tentacle has One-Eye. That's a shame.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_low_on_health_: Don't you think blood is better on the inside, One-Eye?
Those wounds won't close by themselves.
Your willpower is failing you, Saltzpyre.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_on_a_frenzy_04: You've proved your worth this day, Saltzpyre.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_3_special_kills_in_a: Careful, Kruber. You'll have old One-Eye jealous.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_caught_by_slaver_3_t: No, wizard, this isn't good. Too much being dragged and hung, not enough charred corpses.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_01: Wizard? Do we need to slow our pace?
pwe_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_13: Sienna, have you lost a leg perhaps? You're down all the time.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_13_re: A Fire Wizard with a wooden leg! That could be fun.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_hit_by_goo_thrice_01: Stay out of the gas, wizard! How many times?
pwe_gameplay_wizard_is_bunnyjumping_01: Hopping around? I thought you had more dignity, Sienna.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_a_second_rat: A second Rat Ogre falls before the flames!
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_rat_ogre_mel: If that was flirting hitting my ears, then Ereth Khiall, take me away.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_stormfiend_m: Close quarters with a Stormfiend. You're far from an ordinary wizard, Sienna.
Further proof I simply cannot relate to the mayfly experience.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_stormfiend_r: Flames for the flame-beast. Well done, wizard.
Put it like that, mayfly, and Bardin's bound to start eating them,
pwe_gameplay_wizard_misses_bomb_02: That bomb missed by a wide margin. I expected better.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_potions_above_half_h: It's just that I can't believe you wasted our supplies on that little bruise.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_tentacle_grabbed_3_t: Stay AWAY from those tentacles, pyromancer.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_a_01: Lohner could at least have explained why this was necessary.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_a_02: Did Lohner give any explanation at all for this scheme of his?
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_b_01: The old mother is investigating the Skittergate. Necessary work, and worth protecting.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_b_02: Olesya is investigating the Skittergate. I hope she's faring well.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_c_01: Good for her. She has the wit and the way for such work.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_c_02: A good choice. She'll perform the task well.
pwe_hub_grudgemark_a_01: Grudgemarks? Do I look like some hired assassin?
pwe_hub_grudgemark_a_02: I say that if a dwarf wants grudges settling, he can settle them himself.
pwe_hub_grudgemark_b_01: Undertaking tasks for an imaginary friend? It's a nonsense.
pwe_hub_grudgemark_b_02: I don't mind the killing, but doing so at the behest of an imaginary dwarf ... ?
pwe_hub_grudgemark_c_01: Well, I suppose we should get it over with.
pwe_hub_grudgemark_c_02: If Okri had any pride, he'd not send us to do his dirty work.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_hm_one_02: Those things l still need, more than you can ever fathom. But here I am, to the disappointment of many, including myself. And before you ask,. it is none of your business why and where I went.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_hm_three_02: The Old Mother could have asked. I am not pleased with her, nor you, but her motives were... fair, I suppose. Send your underlings to clean up and restore the shrine as recompense, and then... I might forgive you.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_hm_two_02: You were spying on me! You made Olesya use her talents so you could magically peep and pry! Thank your mayfly god it doesn't serve my interest to see your gut sliced open.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_sh_one_02: You imply that I should know in detail about this insignificant event, simply because I'm an elf? Very well, take my advice and tell your agents to steer well clear of the area.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_sh_three_02: I strongly suggest you stop right there Lohner. Meddling in affairs that are none of your concern, or even beyond your faculties to understand, could have... significant consequences on your wellbeing.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_sh_two_02: You keep talking more about an insignificant event, and now adding the wellspring of insignificance that occurred after the first event. of no significance whatsoever. Your mind is addled from the dwarf 'food' you've been cooking, Lohner.
pwe_hub_olesya_conversation_eigthteen_01: When this is done, I will take you, if I'm able. You will not see another wonder like it in your lifetime.
pwe_hub_olesya_conversation_nineteen_01: Only twice so far today, old mother.
pwe_hub_olesya_conversation_seventeen_01: Not I, old mother. Your ears are playing tricks again.
pwe_hub_olesya_conversation_twenty_01: Were I pretending anything, you'd never know.
pwe_level_bell_chime_02: The toll of doom. Curse the ratmen!
pwe_level_bell_chime_03: That cursed clamour! It's the bell!
pwe_level_bell_chime_04: The bell awakens! Cover your ears!
pwe_level_bell_destroyed_03: It is done. We have won, they have lost.
pwe_level_bell_destroy_bell_01: There it is, foul thing. I hope you're ready, cause I'm in no mood for patience.
pwe_level_bell_destroy_bell_02: Bell in sight. Commence mayhem and destruction, mates.
pwe_level_bell_destroy_bell_03: Chains, mayflies. Must I do all your thinking for you?
pwe_level_bell_effect_03: Screech all you wish, rats! The bell's enchantment shall not save you!
pwe_level_bell_effect_04: Madness with every chime. Slay them all!
pwe_level_bell_exit_01: Let's not hang around. We need to get going.
pwe_level_bell_exit_02: I hope we've a shorter walk to the portal.
pwe_level_bell_falling_04: Let the chimes ring out, one last time.
pwe_level_bell_horde_01: That sound! The bell calls them forth.
pwe_level_bell_horde_02: They'll keep coming, lured by the bell.
pwe_level_bell_horde_04: The bell rings, and they answer!
pwe_level_bell_poor_quarters_01: I've had billets like this, and hated every minute.
pwe_level_bell_poor_quarters_02: No fun, living down in the pauper's yards.
pwe_level_bell_poor_quarters_03: And you mayflies wonder why I hate cities?
pwe_level_bell_rain_01: More rain. Still, not as bad as Stromdorf.
pwe_level_bell_rain_02: Rain? Refreshing? Fine, I like being dry more.
pwe_level_bell_reaching_bell_03: Alright, We've come a long way and I'm not leaving without making a mark. We usually do though, so no worries.
pwe_level_bell_rich_quarters_01: Just think, a month back they'd have shoo'd our kind out of these streets. Well, my kind at least.
pwe_level_bell_rich_quarters_02: Now, this is more like it. Windows. Servants. Drains.
pwe_level_bell_rich_quarters_03: Always wanted to afford a little abode like one of these. And only afford. Not a city-dweller, me.
pwe_level_bell_rich_quarters_knight_04: Just think, a month back they'd have shoo'd our kind out of these streets. Well, before the whole Knight thing, anyway.
pwe_level_bell_rooftops_01: Over the rooftops? Can't say I care for it. In fact, been a bit much.
pwe_level_bell_rooftops_02: The rooftops. Always with the bloody up and down.
pwe_level_bell_vista_01: Can't see much through the rain.
pwe_level_bell_vista_02: Climbed a long way, haven't we?
pwe_level_bell_vista_03: This would be a fine view, if the buildings were not here.
pwe_level_bell_vista_04: Brooding skies, marred by ugly mayfly buildings.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_01: Sigmar is a jealous god, but others thrive in his shadow.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_02: Another god? Is there no limit to mayfly invention?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_03: Another statue to worship. How to they find the time?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_04: Divine observance requires more than just raising statues...
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_found_artefact: A revolting blade. Fit only for scunners.
Do we have the sword? About time.
So much desolation from so insignificant a sword. A lesson for us all.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_a_01: See? This is what happens when you let dwarfs play with magic.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_a_02: I hope removing the sword heals Bögenhafen's ills. But I am not sure.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_b_01: The Blightreaper once came to Athel Loren. That was a black day... Some of the glades never recovered.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_b_02: We know of the Blightreaper in Athel Loren. Scarloc once slew its bearer. If only he'd destroyed the sword as well.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_c_01: Can we trust this priest? Friend of Saltzpyre's or not, there's much that could go wrong.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_c_02: Well, Bögenhafen's fate's in the hands of a priest now, mayflies. What could possibly go awry?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_01: There is a hidden room. It must be the sanctum we seek.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_03: There will be a concealed entrance to the sanctum. Seek its release.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_gang_01: So, this lair... Do we even know where to start looking?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_gang_04: We could search for an age in this mess and still not find the Black Hooks' lair.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_fight_themselve: So much for them fighting one another...
They're still too interested in us for my liking...
Our plan has lurched headlong into a nest of thorns.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_01: They lie in wait amongst the ruins.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_02: A ghost village waits to claim more victims.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_03: The Urithairi think I can't hear them lurking within those huts.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_04: That village is far from empty.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_stat: The Weave reclaims all in the end, this village included.
There is no victory over the swamp, as this village proves.
Sooner or later, decay always wins. Perhaps that is why these Urithairi worship it so?
Why would anyone build such a village at all? (disgruntled noise)
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_islands_01: We've reached the outer edge, but the heart we seek lies further in.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_islands_02: This is merely the encampment's outer edge. Hovels for outcasts and the desperate.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_islands_03: These tents are practically in the water. It's as if they seek rotten lungs.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_islands_04: We draw closer with every step. These revolting dwellings mark the path.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_keep_fighting_0: Don't let them trap you, mayflies! We need to find the champion!
Deeper into the camp! Go! Go! Find the champion!
Getting tired, lumberfoots? We've a champion to kill yet!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_live_in_swamp_0: Marshland is seldom the Weave's most attractive face.
A rotten domain - perfect for rotten-hearted Urithairi.
I don't mind the mud. It's the stench. It'll be days before I lose it from my nostrils.
Why do these northlanders feel such kinship with the swamp?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_outer_gate_01: For every obstacle bested, another arises. In this case, another wall.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_outer_gate_02: No celebrating, mayflies. There's a second wall, yet.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_outer_gate_03: I see another wall. Knowing our luck, there'll be a third beyond, and a dragon beyond that.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_outer_gate_04: We've another wall to get through yet, mayflies.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_portal_01: A sleekit bit of improvisation, but it saw the task done.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_portal_02: Can we please leave this swamp?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_portal_03: Let's leave the Urithairi to their swamp. The two go together nicely.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_portal_04: There's the portal. Get me away from this muck.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ravine_01: More foes approach unseen. Curse this ravine!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ravine_02: I hear clomping footsteps that are not our own.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_success_01: Our lair remains undiscovered, and our work is done.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_success_02: Lohner can come out from under his table. The danger is done.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_success_03: Dead mayflies can't find hidden bases, and we left that champion dead as dead can be.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_success_04: That wasn't our tidiest solution, but it should keep Lohner happy... and safe.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_tree_01: The tree's cursed, and purposefully so.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_tree_02: Dark magic swirls about this place. Let us hope their ritual is not yet done.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_tree_03: A tree hung with rotting flesh. How... quaint.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_tree_04: See the tree? Sacrifice has ever been the least pleasant way to attract a god's notice.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_wall_01: That wall won't keep us out.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_wall_02: Smearing defences with blood. A primitive's urge, not a warrior's.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_wall_03: Aim true for the gate, lumberfoots!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_wall_04: Straight through that gate, mayflies! Swift and true as an arrow!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_01: A watchtower is little use in this muck. Patrols and sentries serve better.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_02: The Urithairi keep slack watch, else we'd already be overwhelmed.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_03: Thank Isha there were no watchtowers further out.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_04: That watchtower will surely sink before long.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_which_way_01: Two paths before us. Which do we follow?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_which_way_02: Do not let the choice of paths tempt you to separation, mayflies.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_which_way_03: The path divides. We should not.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_which_way_04: The mire calls. Which woeful path do you prefer, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_chaos_war_surprise_01: They weren't expecting that. (laugh) Where's the champion?
pwe_level_chaos_war_surprise_02: Well, we're in. Where's the champion?
pwe_level_chaos_war_surprise_03: Come to me, oh Urithairi champion. Let us dance the Dance of Blades!
pwe_level_chaos_war_surprise_04: I bring vengeance to visit on your champion!
pwe_level_elven_ruins_proper_01: Back, creatures! I shall not abide your presence here a moment longer!
pwe_level_elven_ruins_proper_02: The temple is... aware? As if it knows the depths of its failure.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_proper_03: We cannot cleanse this place, the enemy is too strong. But we can perhaps undo their works.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_proper_04: Isha! I feel a resonance here. So many memories, fighting their way to the surface.
pwe_level_farmlands_portal_01: Make for the portal, but I've a feeling we'll be back this way.
pwe_level_farmlands_portal_03: Make for the Bridge of Shadows. We'll need Lohner's aid if we're to help the town.
pwe_level_farmlands_portal_04: The portal opens. Perhaps Olesya can deliver us into the benighted town. Wouldn't that be fun, mayflies?
pwe_level_fort_and_again_02: A good beginning, but a beginning only.
pwe_level_fort_and_again_03: That's a fine start. But we must follow with another.
pwe_level_fort_and_again_04: One more hit. That should bring it down.
pwe_level_fort_barrel_fouled_01: The brutish machine has fired its last. Use the other.
pwe_level_fort_barrel_fouled_02: The barrel is clogged. Use the other cannon.
pwe_level_fort_barrel_fouled_03: This cannon will fire no more. What of the other?
pwe_level_fort_barrel_fouled_04: This cannon has fired its last. Is the other still hale?
pwe_level_fort_cannonballs_03: You want to shoot again? We'll need a cannonball.
pwe_level_fort_cannonballs_04: You want to shoot again? We'll need a cannonball.
pwe_level_fort_cannons_silenced_03: The cannons are silent. Screams will follow, mayflies.
pwe_level_fort_cannons_silenced_04: The cannons are silent. Screams will follow, mayflies.
pwe_level_fort_carriage_01: Really, lumberfoots? Can't climb over a carriage?
pwe_level_fort_carriage_02: Come along, mayflies. Can't you climb?
pwe_level_fort_carriage_03: Lileath! Surely you can climb over that?
pwe_level_fort_carriage_04: Surely that carriage can't block your way, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_fort_clear_courtyard_01: Don't grow complacent. We've still northlanders to slaughter.
pwe_level_fort_clear_courtyard_02: The northlanders fight on. Teach them their folly.
pwe_level_fort_clear_courtyard_03: The northlanders fight on. Teach them their folly.
pwe_level_fort_clear_courtyard_04: Come, lumberfoots. We'll end the northlanders' feeble struggles.
pwe_level_fort_complete_01: The Fort is saved. What else can we achieve?
pwe_level_fort_complete_02: We have done as bidden. Let the garrison clean up the mess.
pwe_level_fort_complete_03: The Fort is saved. What else can we achieve?
pwe_level_fort_complete_04: We have done as bidden. Let the garrison clean up the mess.
pwe_level_fort_confirmation_01: And I suppose you're too busy to help?
pwe_level_fort_confirmation_02: What does he think we are, his servants?
pwe_level_fort_confirmation_03: Keeping the easy job for yourself, are you?
pwe_level_fort_confirmation_04: Idle sapling. I bet there aren't even any rats in there.
pwe_level_fort_cross_here_01: Step lightly lumberfoots, or I'll not see you again.
pwe_level_fort_cross_here_02: Unsafe? This? I'm used to logs that are still moving.
pwe_level_fort_cross_here_03: As good as a road to an elf... and perhaps to a lumberfoot.
pwe_level_fort_cross_here_04: A broad bridge... for the stout-hearted...
pwe_level_fort_fire_02: What are you waiting for, mayflies? Fire!
pwe_level_fort_fire_04: Now let the filthy thing sing.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_fire_03: See, there? We can hit it, if our aim is true.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_hit_03: Do you need another lesson, ratmen, or will that serve?
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_hit_04: Do you need another lesson, ratmen, or will that serve?
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_03: Let's hope this vile thing fires true.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_04: A crude tool, but it should serve.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_hit_03: Well I never. It actually hit.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_hit_04: Catapult's down. Through luck, more than skill.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_fuse_is_lit_0: Now let the filthy thing sing.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_03: Oh look, they're bringing us another.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_04: Seems we get to do it all again, mayflies. There's a second catapult.
pwe_level_fort_gate_fallen_03: The gate has fallen. We may be too late.
pwe_level_fort_getting_closer_01: Let us hope this secret path was not merely Lohner's fancy.
pwe_level_fort_getting_closer_02: Let us hope this secret path exists. It's a long climb.
pwe_level_fort_getting_closer_03: Let us hope this secret path exists. It's a long climb.
pwe_level_fort_getting_closer_04: We can only hope there is a secret path.
pwe_level_fort_get_back_on_road_01: I suppose we can return to the road now, if we must.
pwe_level_fort_get_back_on_road_02: The road beckons us again, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_fort_get_back_on_road_03: Is there a route back to the road? The obstruction is long behind.
pwe_level_fort_get_back_on_road_04: Mayflies? Do we wish to re-join the road?
pwe_level_fort_jump_down_01: And now we leave the road behind. Hah!
pwe_level_fort_jump_down_02: It'll be quicker to find a way around than through, mayflies.
pwe_level_fort_jump_down_03: Off the road, mayflies. We'll yet find another path.
pwe_level_fort_jump_down_04: The road will attend to itself. We'll find another way around.
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_destroyed_02: Splinters and bones, nothing else remains!
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_01: That gas. (cough) The catapult's still firing!
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_03: We cannot prevail while the catapult still fires!
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_04: The plague claw will be the death of us!
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_aler: Bombardment! Stay out of the sludge!
Stay out of the filth. Or don't, if you care nothing for agony.
Stay out of the filth. Or don't, if you care nothing for agony.
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_move: Lurking beneath a poison rain is no way to die.
pwe_level_fort_powder_and_shot_01: What does the cursed thing need? Powder, yes? And shot?
pwe_level_fort_powder_and_shot_02: The clumsy thing needs powder and shot.
pwe_level_fort_powder_and_shot_03: The limber's empty. We need powder and shot.
pwe_level_fort_powder_and_shot_04: Search for ammunition. There must be some.
pwe_level_fort_push_them_back_01: Either we take the Outer Courtyard, mayflies, or we might as well go home.
pwe_level_fort_push_them_back_02: To the Outer Courtyard. Do you want this fort saved or not, mayflies?
pwe_level_fort_push_them_back_03: The Outer Courtyard, lumberfoots! Either we take it, or we lose. Your choice.
pwe_level_fort_river_01: We'll search upriver.. unless you'd rather go home?
pwe_level_fort_river_03: There might be another crossing point downriver.
pwe_level_fort_river_04: We'll head upstream. With luck, we'll find a fording point.
pwe_level_fort_skaven_everywhere_04: A good many foes. Enough for us all.
pwe_level_fort_skaven_run_04: Faster in retreat than ever in advance, eh vermin?
pwe_level_fort_spotting_portal_01: And there's the portal. Homeward bound, we are.
pwe_level_fort_spotting_portal_02: At last, the portal. I'm weary of this place.
pwe_level_fort_spotting_portal_03: Next time we'll do this, Olesya can open a portal, and I'll shoot arrows through it from the comfort of home.
pwe_level_fort_spotting_portal_04: Through the portal, mayflies. Even my life's too short for dawdling.
pwe_level_fort_story_five_02: (laugh) Not only trees, but rivers, mountains and the wings of the storms. Nothing forged by men compares.\n
pwe_level_fort_this_is_it_01: I believe we have our secret path... or not so secret, if that gate is any guide.
pwe_level_fort_this_is_it_02: So it does exist. And our foes are here before us...
pwe_level_fort_this_is_it_03: I believe we have our secret path... or not so secret, if that gate is any guide.
pwe_level_fort_this_is_it_04: Is this our secret path? Not so secret. Or was that gate always broken?
pwe_level_fort_under_attack_01: The Fort looks doomed. Then again, who doesn't?
pwe_level_fort_under_attack_02: The final moments of the siege approach. The mayfly blackfire won't last.
pwe_level_fort_under_attack_03: The final moments of the siege approaches. The mayfly blackfire won't last.
pwe_level_fort_under_attack_04: The ratmen have all but won. We should hurry - the assault will be soon.
pwe_level_fort_use_cannons_04: What about the cannons? Might they be of use?
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_mid_fight_01: Keep on, lumberfoots. We'll hit something vital eventually.
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_mid_fight_02: Sleepy, mayflies? No? Then keep fighting.
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_mid_fight_03: He'll go down, mayflies. Just a little more.
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_taunt_reply_0: Ignore him. He's not saying anything worth heeding.
pwe_level_ground_zero_complete_03: The natural world will reclaim this place, in time.
pwe_level_ground_zero_complete_04: The tree dies, and a blow is struck against Plaguefather Nurgle.
pwe_level_ground_zero_corruption_everywh: The Garden of Nurgle seeks purchase. It must be denied.
The realm of the Dark Gods intrudes on the Weave...
This foulness is but a taste of what is planned for the world.
Daemon-blooms. Don't go picking them for posies, mayflies.
pwe_level_ground_zero_crumbling_01: Is this... shifting under my feet?
pwe_level_ground_zero_crumbling_02: This isn't stable. We should hurry.
pwe_level_ground_zero_crumbling_03: Can you not feel the ground moving, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_ground_zero_crumbling_04: Linger not, mayflies. Helmgart longs to slide further into the pit.
pwe_level_ground_zero_get_clear_01: Move, lumberfoots! You don't want to get splashed!
pwe_level_ground_zero_get_clear_02: We should be a long way off, and quickly.
pwe_level_ground_zero_get_clear_03: Get clear of the blast, mayflies.
pwe_level_ground_zero_get_clear_04: I'd take a step back, were I you,
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_01: There. That is what we seek.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_02: That tree is the source of these ills.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_03: A vile corruption, in mimicry of nature.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_04: A twisted imitation of the Weave. It'll be a pleasure to end its existence.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_01: Find a weakness. It must have one.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_02: We must be clever, if you can manage as much, mayflies?
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_03: Cleverness will serve us better than steel.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_04: It is no easy task to vanquish such an abomination.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_feed_explos: Perhaps... black powder? Use one vileness to vanquish another?
We need to feed it something unpleasant... or explosive.
The tree has a maw. Let us feed it something... indigestible.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_its_working: Isha! But this might just work.
It feeds. Eat your fill, daemon!
Foolish daemon. All gullet. No sense.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_response_01: Find a way to end that abomination!
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_response_02: The Weave screams as its roots spread. It must be destroyed!
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_response_03: We must end its existence, mayflies.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_response_04: We cannot tarry. The daemon-tree must die!
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_sever_the_v: You'll not bar my path, daemon-frond!
If the vines are in your way, slice through!
Cut your way through, don't delay!
pwe_level_ground_zero_precarious_02: You might want to take this slow, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_ground_zero_precarious_04: It's a long way down. Careful you don't fall.
pwe_level_ground_zero_smell_01: A vile smell. The Dark Gods are at work here.
pwe_level_ground_zero_smell_02: Like fermented flesh, steeped in dung,
pwe_level_ground_zero_smell_03: Can we please not linger. That stench...
pwe_level_ground_zero_smell_04: That's daemon-stench. We must be close.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_five_01: Ruin, Master Hold-seeker, and at a swift gallop.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_five_02: Neither you or I have grounds to speak of 'good sense' dwarf. Our actions have made that quite clear.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_six_02_x: Have a care. There are fires fiercer than yours.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_six_x: Don't tell me you're looking forward to the experience.
pwe_level_ground_zero_the_hole_02: Such damage to the Weave! The town is a gnat-bite by comparison.
pwe_level_ground_zero_the_hole_03: So perhaps Helmgart is sorer harmed than I thought.
pwe_level_ground_zero_the_hole_04: Senseless destruction. Slaughter should always serve purpose.
pwe_level_ground_zero_the_hole_second_vi: What a bleedin' righteous mess. As I said, we owe payback for this, mates.
Poor bloody Helmgart. And I thought we had it bad in Ubersreik.
Just gets worse the more I see. What have they done?
More dead down there than I can count, I promise you that.
pwe_level_ground_zero_town_01: Well, the town could look worse.
pwe_level_ground_zero_town_02: All that fuss about this place. Look at it - hardly scratched.
pwe_level_ground_zero_town_03: I thought Helmgart was in ruins. Has Lohner been at his own ale?
pwe_level_ground_zero_town_04: Seems reports of Helmgart's devastation were... premature.
pwe_level_ground_zero_welcoming_committe: They've come to greet us. I hear them squalling below.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_door_opens_0: Am I to be impressed by a blown out door? Such waste of energy.
Well, one less door means a handy way out.
So the temple provides an exit? It's the least it can do to thank us.
That door is no more. I guess the mayfly god decided to lift a finger. Shall we remove ourselves?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_five_0: So this... town... is a vital part of the Empire's defences?
Bretonnians? Superstitious greenleaves, every last one. They're endearing, and hardly frightening.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_one_01: You've been around Goreksson for too long.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_ten_01: Why think on matters you'll never witness? Why invite that sorrow?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_ten_02: Hah! This from a dwarf. Do you think on your home?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_twelve: How can you say that? The Skaven have overrun everything.
So the only thing between Helmgart and success is exchanging one set of mayflies for other, shorter mayflies?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_two_01: I thought Sigmar was a presence 'ever at your shoulder'?
pwe_level_mine_found_cart_first_04: There's our cart. Looks intact, thank the Gods.
pwe_level_mine_story_eleven_a_01: It's true. Not just the blind, but the pox-addled as well.
pwe_level_mine_story_five_01: Very little is impossible once the Dark Gods are involved.
pwe_level_mine_story_five_02: Bad dreams? You don't know what you're talking about.
pwe_level_mine_story_nine_01: Did I see you eating one of Olesya's candles earlier, Goreksson?
pwe_level_mine_story_nine_03: I don't just eat... (exasperated noise) Never mind. Can you think of a good reason I shouldn't tell Olesya?
pwe_level_mine_story_nine_04: (laugh) A good argument. Well played, dwarf.
pwe_level_mine_story_seven_a_01: And you thought dwarfs were better? He'd sell his mother for a workable seam, wouldn't you, Hold-seeker?
pwe_level_mine_story_three_01: And yet I sense a quickening to your stride. Are you certain you seek no pleasure here?
pwe_level_mine_story_twelve_01: Do you believe I am everything I seem, or even you, for that matter?
pwe_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_01: The remnant of some ritual, perhaps interrupted.
pwe_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_02: A soul sacrificed, and the body discarded.
pwe_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_03: No altar was ever used for anything wholesome.
pwe_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_04: This wretch is damned. Have a care, lest we share his fate.
pwe_level_nurgle_barrier_03: We cannot let that bar our path.
pwe_level_nurgle_barrier_04: Break through. You've strength enough for that, surely?
pwe_level_nurgle_bury_objective_01: We have a plan and should probably stick to it mayflies. Go for the clusters.
pwe_level_nurgle_bury_objective_02: Right, let's get to burying this thing, lumberfoots. Smash the buboes.
pwe_level_nurgle_bury_objective_03: We have unpleasant work to do mayflies. Break the buboes. It'll feel better afterwards.
pwe_level_nurgle_bury_objective_04: Let's find us these weak spots Lohner spoke of. Buboes. Ugh.
pwe_level_nurgle_cluster_one_destroyed_0: That's enough of that. Move on, there's more foul growth to kill.
This cave's done, mayflies. Seek more clusters, and yes, smash more clusters.
No more scunner filth to bust open here, mayflies. Move on.
We're out of scunner clusters to break. There should be more.
pwe_level_nurgle_cluster_two_destroyed_0: More weave-pain alleviated, mayflies. Seek more.
We won't find any more to break here, mayflies. Push on.
Aye, that's another cave rid of scunner filth. The filth that matters.
Oh, we've slashed enough clusters here. Hear the old scunner soul writhe!
pwe_level_nurgle_digsite_01: We draw near. The weave tells me so.
pwe_level_nurgle_digsite_03: We're approaching the root of this, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_nurgle_drop_down_01: Why do we always end up going down?
pwe_level_nurgle_drop_down_02: Down I go. Can you keep up, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_nurgle_drop_down_04: Here's our path, mayflies. Down we go.
pwe_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_01: Old workings. This is not the place.
pwe_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_02: We must keep on. This is old work.
pwe_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_03: These mines are old. We seek newer toil.
pwe_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_04: These mines were hewn long ago. We seek fresher toil.
pwe_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_01: Who's to say how long the rest will hold up? We should find the portal.
pwe_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_02: Look for the bridge. The whole cavern might yet collapse.
pwe_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_03: Where is the portal? I long to be away.
pwe_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_04: Our retreat is cut. We must find the portal.
pwe_level_nurgle_nurglification_02: Abhorrent growths. Have care not to touch them
pwe_level_nurgle_nurglification_03: Corruption. We must be getting close.
pwe_level_nurgle_nurglification_04: Have a care, lumberfoots. A foul mind guides this growth.
pwe_level_nurgle_nurglification_increase: Isha! The grandfather of all plagues does his work here.
This is the fate of the world, if we fail.
Such foulness. The Weave.. it screams in agony.
This is the world's fate, save for our striving.
pwe_level_nurgle_outcast_lair_01: Bandits. Hah. Mayflies ever prey upon their own kind.
pwe_level_nurgle_outcast_lair_02: Brigands and thieves once bedded down in this place.
pwe_level_nurgle_outcast_lair_03: This was a hideout, but the pact-sworn see further that mayfly reeves.
pwe_level_nurgle_outcast_lair_04: This lair is emptied of purpose, its occupants long dead.
pwe_level_nurgle_river_01: A watercourse. As Lohner said there'd be.
pwe_level_nurgle_river_02: This river shows we haven't strayed.
pwe_level_nurgle_river_03: A river? So we've not meandered far from our course.
pwe_level_nurgle_river_04: A pitiful river, but it marks our path.
pwe_level_nurgle_ruins_01: Mayfly settlements come. Mayfly settlements go. The trick is not to care.
pwe_level_nurgle_ruins_02: Been many a year since these were home to anyone.
pwe_level_nurgle_ruins_03: No one left to call these home, mayflies.
pwe_level_nurgle_ruins_04: Abandoned out of fear, or did the occupants perish to the last?
pwe_level_nurgle_skaven_collapse_01: Let the raki kill each other. It matters little to me. There will never be a shortage.
pwe_level_nurgle_skaven_collapse_02: The pace of skaven tunnelling does not go without cost.
pwe_level_nurgle_skaven_collapse_03: As always, slain by carelessness, and reckless haste.
pwe_level_nurgle_skaven_collapse_04: A slave is a slave, in skaven eyes, and disposable, regardless of race.
pwe_level_prologue_almost_there_01: Out in the open, at last!
pwe_level_prologue_almost_there_03: How much further? We shouldn't push our luck.
pwe_level_prologue_almost_there_04: Fresh air! Or as near I'm fortunate enough to get.
pwe_level_prologue_chaos_01: Northlanders? Here? Did you not think to mention this, Kruber?
pwe_level_prologue_chaos_02: Northlanders and Skaven? This gets better by the moment.
pwe_level_prologue_chaos_03: There are northlanders too? I don't like this.
pwe_level_prologue_chaos_04: Sleekit Skaven were bad enough, but glaikit northlanders?
pwe_level_prologue_dwarf_down_01: Typical dwarf. Me, me, me. Show some backbone.
pwe_level_prologue_dwarf_down_02: What's the matter? Dizzy from being so high up?
pwe_level_prologue_dwarf_down_03: Not used to being so high off the ground, Bardin?
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_02: I think I see our exit.
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_rising_01: It seems our hosts don't want us to leave.
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_rising_02: Can this platform not go any faster?
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_rising_04: We're leaving you, ratmen, but I'll wager we'll be back!
pwe_level_prologue_fight_01: So you want to fight, vermin? I warn you fair, I'm in no mood.
pwe_level_prologue_fight_02: Fight me? The mood I'm in? Oh, my poor little ratmen.
pwe_level_prologue_fight_03: I'm glad they still want to fight. So do I.
pwe_level_prologue_fight_04: You lock me up, then think I'll be merciful?
pwe_level_prologue_seeing_crater_01b: Aye, no wonder the weave is in tatters, howling in pain. This is an atrocity. It must be avenged.
pwe_level_prologue_stock_up_01: Well, don't just stare at it. Take what you need.
pwe_level_prologue_stock_up_02: If we don't use it, the ratmen will.
pwe_level_prologue_stock_up_03: Better we put it to use than they do.
pwe_level_prologue_stock_up_04: Come on, lumberfoots. Take whatever you can.
pwe_level_prologue_supply_02: These rats steal anything that isn't nailed down.
pwe_level_prologue_supply_04: The packrats have been at work again.
pwe_level_prologue_thanks_01: You're free? Not bad for a lumberfoot.
pwe_level_prologue_thanks_02: It's been a long time coming, but I suppose I now owe you one.
pwe_level_prologue_thanks_03: Rescued by you, Kruber? Had to happen sometime.
pwe_level_prologue_thanks_04: Get your hands off me Kruber. I can manage.
pwe_level_prologue_what_are_they_up_to_0: Such wicked industry. But to what purpose?
The ratmen are up to something. I can feel it.
I don't know about you, but I've a burning desire to disjoint their plans.
Lileath! Whatever this vermin intend, it can't be good.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_city_on_fire: The flames spread. I am pleased.
Hah! That blaze makes my heart sing.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_destroy_bann: One last drop of mischief - strike the colours!
Wouldn't hurt us to cut down the flag, whilst we're here.
Would one of you mayflies cut down the flag?
If we desire more unrest, severing the flag's moorings should give us all we want.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_elevator_03: This will take us to the surface... I hope.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_elevator_04: This will save the climb... Or plummet into darkness.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_find_another: Rat trash blocks our path. We'll have to scout for another way to the forge.
Dead end of rat garbage. No way through to the forge here.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_follow_track: Keep to the tracks and we'll find that forge, mayflies.
Follow the tracks, mayflies. They should lead us to the forge.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_foundry_ente: Ugh, the stench of this place... the worst of dwarf and vermin combined. Do not linger, the Main Warren is close.
Can you not smell that? Dwarf stink and skaven stink all mingled. And the Main Warren should not be far away.
Ah, so much for a majestic forge. But we're on the right path, next should be the Main Warren.
You see industry. I see a mistake, yearning to be unmade. Seems the skaven achieved that their usual way...
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_hearing_pens: Tread with care, lumberfoots. I hear rat ogres.
Mayflies? Do you not hear the rat ogres?
There are rat ogres close by. Tread lightly, or run swiftly.
Rat ogres are close. We should hurry on by.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_lifting_devi: By Isha, that paid off beautifully!
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_move_lifting: That contraption's blocking our path. mayflies.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_so_much_for_: So much for stealth, lumberfoots! Can you not manage a simple task without making a blessed racket?
Gods, spare me from mayflies with leaden feet and cloth ears.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_story_four_0: Are there many Skaven scholars in your Empire?
(laugh) How can that be? The ratmen have brought your realm to ruin more than once.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_story_nine_0: Hah, lumberfoots and your flames? I had an inkling too.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_story_seven_: How long's this hold been in Skaven hands? One century? Two? Three?
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_viaduct_01: The viaduct, mayflies. Head for it.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_warlord_nest: See that squalor? A warlord's nest.
We'll find our quarry in that nest, or close by.
A warlord's lair looks little different to me than Bardin's room.
The warlord seeks height, to compensate for lacking stature elsewhere.
pwe_level_skittergate_crates_01: We should investigate those crates, perhaps?
pwe_level_skittergate_crates_02: Maybe the northlanders have been shipping warpstone from the Chaos Wastes?
pwe_level_skittergate_crates_03: We should search the dockside. Those crates may house what we need.
pwe_level_skittergate_crates_04: We can't afford delay. Make for the docks. We'll search the crates.
pwe_level_skittergate_dead_seer_04: And the seer's dead. About time.
pwe_level_skittergate_destroy_01: I think we needed more of a plan. How do we destroy that?
pwe_level_skittergate_destroy_02: So we're here. How do we destroy it? I'm waiting.
pwe_level_skittergate_destroy_03: We're to destroy that? And how might we do so, exactly?
pwe_level_skittergate_destroy_04: No obvious way to destroy it. We should have brought Olesya - used her cutting wit.
pwe_level_skittergate_encampment_01: There's an encampment in our path. Try to keep up, mayflies.
pwe_level_skittergate_encampment_02: We cannot afford to be slowed. We'll pass through the camp like a steel wind.
pwe_level_skittergate_encampment_03: Stay close, lumberfoots. It'll be hard fighting ahead.
pwe_level_skittergate_encampment_04: Northlander encampment ahead. Win or lose, let's give them a legend to remember us by.
pwe_level_skittergate_fire_gatekkeper_de: Has it finally ceased its thrashing?
Stay down, scunner. Settle with two deaths today.
If only all triumphs were so complete.
pwe_level_skittergate_fire_gatekkeper_tr: Seems his god is none too pleased. Fight on, mayflies!
The body writhes to match a corrupt soul. It'll die, all the same.
pwe_level_skittergate_follow_01: We'll have to go through the skittergate.
pwe_level_skittergate_follow_02: Lileath help me, but we'll have to go through the gate.
pwe_level_skittergate_follow_03: And where's he off to? We'd better follow.
pwe_level_skittergate_follow_04: The ratman flees! What a surprise. But we'll catch him yet, mayflies.
pwe_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_02: One hawkship from Ulthuan, and those northlanders would learn a valuable lesson.
pwe_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_03: Look at those hulks. Northlanders are as clumsy on the waves as they are on dry land.
pwe_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_04: See those ships? The first of many, if we fail.
pwe_level_skittergate_gatekeeper_death_0: No challenge at all. Where's the Keystaff?
He's down. Grab the Keystaff. We've more to do.
He's dead, mayflies. We should take the Keystaff and go.
Ignore that pile of putrid flesh. Take the Keystaff.
pwe_level_skittergate_open_the_gate_01: Can we get that gate open?
pwe_level_skittergate_open_the_gate_02: A wooden barricade shouldn't hold us back.
pwe_level_skittergate_open_the_gate_04: You may like it on this side of the gate, mayflies. I do not.
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_death_rat: Don't waste your efforts on the Seer when his shield is up! Soften up the Stormfiend!
Fight the Stormfiend, not Rasknitt! When his shield is down, I'm melting eyeballs!
The seer's shield is up! We have the big juicy target of the Stormfiend to focus on!
Let the Stormfiend have it! No use engaging the shielded bastard riding it.
It's a bit too much of everything to live, darlings! Bring down the Stormfiend!
The Stormfiend, darlings. Show it how much we love it.
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_dismounte: Shield is down, darlings. The Seer's ripe for plucking. One stab for every person he's killed.
Seer's defence dropped, darlings! Who's with me ganging up on him?
No shield on the Seer! We all want payback, darlings! This is the time!
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_gate_big_: This might be interesting. Even you mayflies can't miss that lumbering.
I sounds like the Grey Seer has... Over compensated.
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_reply_a_0: Interfering? This is just a game to me, seer.
Talk, talk, talk. When do we get to the killing?
I'm an elf. Interference is like breathing to us.
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_reply_b_0: You mistake me for someone who cares what you think.
I'm sorry, were you talking to me?
Go on, puff out your chest. Maybe that'll be more convincing.
Words are easy, seer. Have you actions to back them up?
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_teleport_: Move, lumberfoots! If the rat gets away again, someone's paying for it!
Don't lose the seer-rat, lumberfoots! Move!
Move, lumberfoots! Don't let him escape!
Keep up with him, mayflies! Don't let him get away again!
pwe_level_skittergate_replace_power_02: Set that cursed rock in position.
pwe_level_skittergate_replace_power_04: Lileath! What's the delay? Activate the gate.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_eight_01: That seems a bit, capricious, even for you.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_eight_02: I suppose not. We are all true to our natures... and our addictions.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_one_01: Are we ready for this, mayflies? The whole of the Reikland teeters on our actions.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_one_02: I can't help what you hear, sergeant. But I do take pride in a job well done.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_six_01: Did you see that seer, mocking us again?
pwe_level_skittergate_story_six_02: He locked me up. I'll have his pelt for that.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_ten_01: It's only a taste of what's to come.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_ten_02: Know? I don't 'know' anything. But I fear for the future.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_twelve_01: Many have said the same, One-Eye. Few have succeeded.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_twelve_02: Was that... a joke? From you? Truly, this is the End Times come upon us.
pwe_level_skittergate_vast_camp_01: A numerous as leaves in a forest...
pwe_level_skittergate_vast_camp_02: It seems we've interrupted their plans just in time.
pwe_level_skittergate_vast_camp_03: That is a great many northlanders.
pwe_level_skittergate_vast_camp_04: Even I can't fight that many, mayflies.
pwe_level_skittergate_winchway_follow_02: Try to keep up, lumberfoots. We've only one chance at this.
pwe_level_skittergate_winch_01: That winch-way will save us the effort of carrying the stone ourselves.
pwe_level_skittergate_winch_02: I'm not touching that tainted rock. Set the winch moving.
pwe_level_skittergate_winch_03: If you think I'm touching that rock... Use the winch-way instead.
pwe_level_skittergate_winch_04: Look like the winch-way runs all the way back to the gate.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_torch_02: We need fire. Is there a torch to hand?
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_torch_03: A flame will bring this to noisy life.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_torch_04: Just a flicker of flame, and we're ready.
pwe_level_ussingen_gatehouse_03: The gate's open. Quickly! Before they've a chance to close it!
pwe_level_ussingen_gate_closed_01: If we can't go through, we should go around.
pwe_level_ussingen_gate_closed_02: That gate doesn't look much for cooperating, mayflies.
pwe_level_ussingen_gate_closed_03: The road is sealed tight, but there must be some way around.
pwe_level_ussingen_gate_closed_04: We cannot open that gate. But we're not thwarted so easily.
pwe_level_ussingen_manor_found_01: So here it is. Like Lohner said.
pwe_level_ussingen_manor_found_04: There it is. Now let's remove it from this unhappy world.
pwe_level_ussingen_search_for_manor_04: To think we're actually going to cause more destruction to this town.
pwe_level_ussingen_what_next_01: Find the black powder in the Mining Emporium so we can blow up that tasteless building.
pwe_level_ussingen_what_next_02: If the Mining Emporium's empty, we'll have to improvise... and Lohner won't like it when I improvise on him for not keeping his promises.
pwe_level_ussingen_what_next_03: Lumberfoot your way to the Mining Emporium. We have filthy black powder to fetch.
pwe_level_ussingen_what_next_04: Search for the Mining Emporium. We need its black powder, unfortunately.
pwe_morris_hub_interact_lileath_01: Lileath is the Goddess of the Moon, commonly associated with fortune and seers. Of course, not all fortune is good, and not all prophecy pleasant in its unfolding.
pwe_morris_met_god_conversation_01: I heard myself reflected. To be honest, I don't know that it was Lileath at all.
pwe_morris_met_god_conversation_02: Lileath spoke to me as an older version of myself. I don't know what it means.
pwe_nurgle_intro_c_01: Scunner edifices are poison on the Weave. Burying it should only be temporary measure.. Move, lumberfoots.
pwe_nurgle_intro_c_02: Should we be closer to Athel Loren, Spellsingers would have razed this Scunner soul-stone long ago. But unfortunately, we're not.
pwe_objective_correct_path_bridge_14: This way! Over the bridge, mayflies!
pwe_objective_correct_path_bridge_15: I'm at the bridge! Goddess, you're slow.
pwe_objective_correct_path_bridge_16: Come to the bridge, mayflies! Run!
pwe_objective_correct_path_door_03: I'm at the door! Come on!
pwe_objective_dropping_grimoire_03: We should never have touched it.
pwe_objective_dropping_grimoire_04: I carried its weight in my heart as much as on my shoulders.
pwe_objective_dropping_grimoire_05: It will find us again. It knows us now.
pwe_objective_dropping_grimoire_06: Pray its masters never seek us out.
pwe_objective_dropping_grimoire_07: The grimoire has fled. I hope it never returns.
pwe_objective_dropping_grimoire_08: The book has gone, but has left my soul branded.
pwe_objective_dropping_grimoire_09: That's better. Perhaps now the voices will cease.
pwe_objective_dropping_grimoire_10: Ach! It is not worth the burden.
pwe_objective_dropping_grimoire_11: I'll carry that cursed dross no longer.
pwe_objective_goal_achieved_escape_01: Come. We've done all we can!
pwe_objective_goal_achieved_escape_02: There is nothing left for us in this place.
pwe_objective_goal_achieved_escape_03: Come, lest you want to be rat-food.
pwe_objective_goal_achieved_escape_04: Escape! And not a heartbeat too soon.
pwe_objective_goal_achieved_more_left_01: A glimpse of green does not guarantee spring.
pwe_objective_goal_achieved_more_left_03: There's little time. Pick up the pace.
pwe_objective_goal_achieved_more_left_04: It's a start, but there's more to do.
pwe_objective_goal_achieved_more_left_07: If we go any slower at this, we'll be stopped.
pwe_objective_interacting_with_objective: Once again, you depend on me.
pwe_objective_nearing_objective_deadline: Before you die of old age.
pwe_objective_picking_up_grimoire_01: Ah! It burns with every step.
pwe_objective_picking_up_grimoire_02: It whispers in the spaces between the winds.
pwe_objective_picking_up_grimoire_03: Like teeth, gnawing at my soul.
pwe_objective_picking_up_grimoire_04: Rat-scrawl on every page. This is not a safe prize.
pwe_objective_picking_up_grimoire_05: It sings a song without word, every note the chiming of a lost soul.
pwe_objective_picking_up_grimoire_06: Do not touch it, mayflies. It will devour your brief souls.
pwe_objective_picking_up_grimoire_07: It knows my count? How does it know my count?
pwe_objective_picking_up_grimoire_08: You see pages. I see a bottomless pit, and glinting eyes.
pwe_objective_picking_up_grimoire_12: A foul artefact. Must I bear it?
pwe_objective_skaven_exit_01: Daylight! Or the best we'll get, anyway.
pwe_objective_skaven_exit_02: A breeze. Fresh air. Thank the Ancients.
pwe_objective_skaven_exit_04: The way is open. Just a little further!
pwe_painter_conversation_two_01: Only in blood. Would you like me to show you?
pwe_portals_crypt_event_demon_voice_04: And now there's a daemon laughing at us. Well this gets better and better.
pwe_portals_get_out_01: We need to be gone from here.
pwe_portals_get_out_02: We can't let them delay us.
pwe_portals_get_out_03: Through, mayflies! Through! Don't let them pin you.
pwe_portals_memory_path_02: Live long enough, and everywhere looks familiar, but this place...?
pwe_portals_memory_path_04: This all looks familiar, doesn't it mayflies?
pwe_portals_the_temple_01: Is that the temple? Hard to tell one crude mayfly building from another.
pwe_portals_trail_found_02: We've a long walk yet. Keep going up!
pwe_portals_trail_found_04: This path will lead us to the castle.
pwe_portals_village_raided_01: If it's killing the Pactsworn want, it's killing they'll get.
pwe_portals_village_raided_02: Let's see how they fare against those who can fight back.
pwe_portals_village_raided_03: Are you prepared, lumberfoots? This will test you.
pwe_portals_village_raided_04: Stay close. We'll fight them together. Or I can fight them, and you can watch.
pwe_prologue_move_b_01: I agree with the old mother. Assuming she has a plan.
pwe_prologue_move_d_01: Tapping into a waystone? That's impressive, for a mayfly.
pwe_prologue_olesya_a_01: Is that Olesya Pimenova? Or am I hearing things?
pwe_prologue_olesya_a_02: I'm further gone than I thought. I'm hearing Olesya Pimenova...
pwe_prologue_portal_b_01: Can't say I've missed that tone.
pwe_prologue_portal_d_01: Let's hope the old mother has her enchantments in hand...
pwe_skittergate_power_up_a_01: So, we came here to destroy the skittergate, but now we'll have to power the wretched thing up.
pwe_skittergate_power_up_a_02: The gate's only dormant. Good for us, if we want to get home. Bad for Helmgart.
pwe_skittergate_power_up_b_01: The Skaven will have more warpstone nearby. We need only find it.
pwe_skittergate_power_up_b_02: Then we seek fresh warpstone, and put it to use.
pwe_skittergate_power_up_c_01: And when it's powered, we can have the machine do itself a mischief.
pwe_skittergate_power_up_c_02: Escape should not be our priority. The destruction of the gate comes first.
pwe_st_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_22: You think that's a lot? Bloodlings, this is nothing.
pwe_targeted_by_ratling_01: The rat's wants to shoot me dead, hah!
pwe_targeted_by_ratling_02: The vermin gun is targeting me!
pwe_targeted_by_ratling_04: I'm the one he's aiming for! Kill it!
pwe_targeted_by_ratling_05: The filthy rat gunner tries to keep up with me, hah!
pwe_targeted_by_ratling_07: The gunner aims for me! You flank it!
pwe_ussingen_intro_a_01: Feels good to be on the offensive again. Let's find that manor.
pwe_ussingen_intro_b_01: I'll gladly deny the Urithairi food and supplies. I'll deny them life alongside.
pwe_ussingen_intro_b_02: We go in. We burn the supplies. We get out. No complications.
pwe_ussingen_intro_c_01: Are we done posturing? I'm bored.
pwe_we_future_three_03: Don't deny it. Outcasts know one another by sight. Especially those responsible for their own fate.
pwe_wh_backstory_five_01: So persecution is a family trade?
pwe_wh_backstory_five_02: I shouldn't be surprised. Misery grows bleak blooms.
pwe_witch_hunter_eaten_07: Chaos Spawn eating bits off One-eye! Is it only using one of its disgusting feeder-holes?
pwh_activate_ability_zealot_07: Death to the heretic, death to the blasphemer, death to the vermin and death to the unworthy! Death by the holy light of Sigmar! Holy Lustration! I cleanse thy depraved existence!
pwh_activate_ability_zealot_08: Do you see the light? Do you? Do you feel it? The burning light of Sigmar, scorching your soul and breaking your bones! Burning and bludgeoning away the sinful spirit and flesh! Holy Lustration!
pwh_activate_ability_zealot_09: Holy Lustration! I shine the light of Sigmar upon you! Sacred and purifying, it's blazing from my soul, bathing all who dare my presence! Die in the holy light! Die by the holy light! Die as the light lends wrathful strength to my strikes!
pwh_activate_ability_zealot_10: I am your punishment! I am your fate, I am your reckoning, and by the Hammer, I am your death! The light of Sigmar burns like a thousand white suns within me, guiding my hand as I thrash the life out of your sin-begotten bodies! Lustration by the holy light!
pwh_ameplay_soldier_potions_above_half_h: And you'll carry any corpse we have to lug back due to your squeamish wasting.
pwh_celestial_weave_conversation_two_01: I've heard priests claim that Sigmar's spirit roams the heavenly wind.
pwh_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_b_01: You speak truly. VERY WELL, SPAWN OF HERESY! WE ACCEPT YOUR CHALLENGE!
pwh_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_b_02: You have the right of it. WE SHALL FACE YOU, IN SIGMAR'S NAME!
pwh_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_c_01: You speak truly. VERY WELL, SPAWN OF HERESY! WE ACCEPT YOUR CHALLENGE!
pwh_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_c_02: You have the right of it. WE SHALL FACE YOU, IN SIGMAR'S NAME!
pwh_crawl_end_event_find_good_beer_03: A cask of Bugman's? A worthy tipple for the likes of us. Bring it along.
pwh_crawl_end_event_find_good_beer_04: We shouldn't let that Bugman's go to waste...
pwh_crawl_end_event_keep_running_04: Sigmar speed us on our path!
pwh_crawl_end_event_waystone_01: We can afford no more dallying!
pwh_crawl_end_event_waystone_02: Quick, into the portal with our prize.
pwh_crawl_end_event_way_open_01: The cellars may yet see us safe.
pwh_crawl_get_into_third_pub_03: Sigmar's Wrath! I shall not be denied so close!
pwh_crawl_get_into_third_pub_04: Surely there is a way inside?
pwh_crawl_get_out_soon_04: Who did that? Must we burn everything to cinders?
pwh_crawl_have_a_drink_02: T'would be wasteful to pass by and not drink the remains.
pwh_crawl_have_a_drink_04: Warm ale is better than no ale at all...
pwh_crawl_head_for_first_pub_01: Do we have to look for a dwarf tavern? What's wrong with stout Imperial ale? Or Imperial stout, come to that?
pwh_crawl_head_for_second_pub_01: Didn't someone say there was another tavern beyond the abyss?
pwh_crawl_head_for_second_pub_03: There must be another tavern! Sigmar calls for ale! I call for ale! We shall search beyond the abyss!
pwh_crawl_head_for_third_pub_02: The Obese Megalodon was always a sturdy tavern. Surely it has endured the night?
pwh_crawl_head_for_third_pub_03: My thirst remains. What of the Obese Megalodon? Does it still stand?
pwh_crawl_heard_us_01: That will have got their attention... Bring them on!
pwh_crawl_heard_us_02: Tell me... Were we supposed to keep quiet? Ah.
pwh_crawl_loud_crash_01: Careful! I think they heard that!
pwh_crawl_loud_crash_02: Have a care! We don't need to draw attention.
pwh_crawl_loud_crash_03: Careful, lumberfoot! *pause* Oh, Blessed Hammer, she has me doing it now.
pwh_crawl_loud_crash_04: Oh well done. Why not bring the whole place down on us?
pwh_crawl_mid_level_banter_01: I confess... I'm actually enjoying this...
pwh_crawl_mid_level_banter_03: We can't turn back. T'would be sinful to leave a good drop for the pactsworn.
pwh_crawl_old_path_blocked_02: Tragedy! We have met our match!
pwh_crawl_old_path_blocked_04: We shall not be defeated! Though our path is blocked, we shall... Sorry, what was I saying?
pwh_crawl_pub_brazers_02: See? The place blazes with light even now!
pwh_crawl_pub_brazers_04: Look! The fires of hearth and home! Sigmar praise Valaya's charity!
pwh_crawl_pub_destroyed_03: By Sigmar! This shall not be borne! No drink, and now a horde of heretics comes for my head! Not tonight! No!

pwh_gameplay_casual_quotes_01: I've seen many things in my time, but nothing disgusts me more than Skaven!

pwh_gameplay_chieftain_banter_reply_stor: Oh do go on. Where's that Plague Priest of yours? I'd like a reunion with him as well.
Yes, I tremble with fear. And I hope your Plague Priest isn't around, my nerves couldn't take it.

pwh_gameplay_chieftain_charge_attack_tau: Is he aware of how ridiculous that looked?
Now, why would anyone do that?

pwh_gameplay_response_167: Did you even convince yourself, sergeant?
